La socia  tiene 50 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, ella es propietaria de una tienda donde vende chompas, mantas y muñecas, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mantas, chompas, muñecas, polos y pantalones.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "INTI QUILLA".  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is 50 years old and single.  The member alternates her daily activities with the business of selling crafts; she owns a shop selling sweaters, blankets and dolls.  She works from 6:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., and through this business the partner has been able to bring up her children. The member wants to expand her business selling handicrafts. The member is requesting the loan to buy blankets, sweaters, dolls, T-shirts and pants.  The member is happy about the loan and agrees to comply with paying her repayments.

loans.use: to buy blankets, sweaters, dolls, T-shirts and pants.

loans.name: Secundino Antonio

texts.es:
Don Secundino se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras con mas de cuatro años, iniciando este pequeño negocio cuando se jubilo, su esposa tambien se dedica al comercio en venta de ropa usada, pues ambos se ayudan para pagar los gastos basico y gastos personales.
El objetivo de Secundiono es el mejoramiento de su vivienda, en donde ha venido trabajando en doce ciclos de financiamiento que Afodenic ha otorgado. Logrando ampliar mas su casa.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo terminara de cerrar su bajaterte, y construcion de las paredes. Lo que comprara materiales de construccion como: bloques, hierro, arena, piedrin, laminas de zinc, perlines, y comenzar la obra. Contento ya que podra dar  a su familia mejores condiciones de vivienda.
texts.en:
For the past four years Mr. Secundino has been selling fruits and vegetables. He began this small business when he retired. His wife also has a small business selling used clothes. In other words, both of them help to pay for their basic and personal expenses.
Mr. Secundino would like to improve his house. He has had twelve loans with the Afodenic Bank that he has used for this purpose. He would like to expand his house.
With this new loan he will enclose his shed and build walls. He would like to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, iron, sand, gravel, zinc sheets, and metal braces in order to begin this project. He is happy that he can provide his family with a better home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to finish the shed in front of his house. He will build walls in order to have a better space for his family.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 55 años de edad y es conviviente  y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, ella tiene una tienda de artesanía donde vende polos, chompas, muñecas y pantalones, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Inti Quilla" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 55 years old, lives with her common-law husband, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts.  The borrower has a handicrafts store where she sells tops, sweaters, dolls and pants.  She works from 9.00am to 7.00pm.  Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  The borrower would like to expand her business selling handicrafts. She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise wholesale.

The borrower is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es: La Sra. María de Jesús  ella es trabajadora activa de la empresa de Enacal SRS desempeñándose como Afanadora  tiene  siete   años de trabajar para esta institución, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha obtenido  trece créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como, Arena, Cemento, piedra, piedrín etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: María de Jesús works for Enacal SRS as a cleaner.  She has been working for this institution for seven years.  She has two school-age children.  María de Jesús has obtained thirteen loans from CEPRODEL and she has used each one to buy building supplies such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, etc.  She would like to extend and improve her home.  She has greatly benefited from Ceprodel loans which have enabled her to improve her own living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as sand, stone, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 52 años de edad y es casada  y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de artesanía, ella vende al por mayor a las diferentes tiendas que venden artesanía, la socia trabaja independiente, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía como chompas, polos y muñecas.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Inti Quilla" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 52 years old, married, and has six children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling handicrafts.  She sells wholesale to stores that sell handicrafts.  She works for herself and, through her business, she gets her children ahead in life.  The borrower would like to improve her business selling handicrafts.  She is requesting this loan to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, tops and dolls.

The borrower is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy handicrafts such as sweaters, tops and dolls

loans.name: Enedina

texts.es: Enedina es una madre D. familia, vive en compañía D. su hijo y su esposo en su casa que es propia. ElL. siempre ha buscado oportunidades D. desarrollo para sus hijos, es así que decidió radicar en L. zona urbana D. su distrito y acudir a sus terrenos durante L. época D. siembra y cosecha. Nunca ha dejado D. cultivar L. tierra, pues es lo que más domina y eso le permite tener ganancias. Por otro lado su esposo trabaja y D. las ganancias que obtiene también lo deriva para los gastos familiares. Lo que más cultiva es el maíz  y después lo hace secar al sol y lo desgrana para venderlo a mayor precio y por kilos en el mercado central D. su ciudad. Parte D. su trabajo selecciona algunos granos para ser utilizando como semilL. y así volver aumentar su productividad. Con más D. 11 años D. experiencia que tiene en L. agricultura tiene deseos D. seguir adelante con esta actividad del cual disfruta y por ello desea intensificarse. Es L. segunda vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, recuerda en aquel momento en que decidió  formar parte del grupo, han demostrado cada uno D. sus integrantes el ser puntuales en el pago D. sus cuotas. Asimismo considera que cada préstamo es una oportunidad que le permite afrontar con éxito L. inversión que hace en L. agricultura. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en L. compra D. sacos D. abono orgánico para su próxima campaña D. siembra.
texts.en:
Enedina is a mother who lives with her son and husband in their own home.  She has always looked for ways to make progress for the sake of her child.  She decided to live in the urban area of her district and tend to her farmland during sowing and harvesting seasons.  Enedina has never neglected her land.  This is her most dominant business activity and it allows her to make profits. Her husband works and they use the profits that he makes to cover their family expenses.  

Enedina mostly grows corn and, after she has dried it in the sun and separated the kernels, she sells it for a good price, by the kilo, in the central market in her town.  As part of her work, she selects some grains to be used as seed and thereby increases her productivity.

Enedina has more than 11 years experience in farming.  She has a desire to get ahead in this business that she enjoys and, for this reason, she would like to intensify her work with her crops.  This is the second time that she has requested a loan from MFP.  She remembers the time that she joined her group.  Each one of the members of her group have shown themselves to be punctual in making their loan repayments.  Enedina sees each loan as an opportunity to successfully invest in her farming.  She will invest the loan that she has requested in buying sacks of organic fertilizer for her upcoming sowing season.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous

El socio pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 40 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de platería, el vende aretes, collares y pulseras, el socio reparte platería a las diferentes tiendas que venden accesorios de plata y también trabaja en el sector turismo, por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de platería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar platería y materiales para hacer aretes, collares y pulseras.
 
                                                
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This person is a member of the “INTIQUILLA” Community Bank. This bank is located in the Cusco District, which is in the Cusco Province in the Cusco Department. This member is 40 years old, single and has one child. This member varies his daily activities between selling silver to different stores that sell silver accessories and working in the tourism business. Because of these businesses our member is able to help his children to succeed. This member would like to expand his silver sales business. He is asking for a loan to buy silver and materials to make earrings, necklaces and bracelets.
This member is happy for the opportunity to have this loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy silver and materials needed to make earrings, necklaces and bracelets.

loans.name: Esperanza Para El Futuro Group

texts.es:
Isabel es una de los 08 integrantes de la Nueva  Alcancía Comunal “Esperanza para el Futuro”, grupo que  están agradecidos y comprometidos a trabajar honestamente  con el Programa Prosperidad.
Isabel, nació en Ucayali pero vive hace mas de 20 años en Nicolás de Piérola-Chosica  es casada y tiene  05 hijos (34, 33, 27, 22, y 16) la cual  sigue apoyando a  la última de sus hijos ya que está por terminar el  colegio. Hace más de 3 años Isabel se dedica a la venta de miel de abeja y aceite de oliva, donde para adquirir de estos productos tiene que viajar hasta Ucayali su tierra, gran parte de sus clientes son  sus vecinos y conocidos que la apoyan,  esto nació con la idea de  querer surgir y así poder  apoyar a su esposo  con los gastos del hogar, Isabel a sus 52 años desea seguir trabajando positivamente  ya que su mayor anhelo es ver a su hija graduada. Con el préstamo solicitado Isabel piensa invertir en su negocio ya que en  Julio empieza la cosecha de miel en su tierra. A  futuro ella desearía poner un restaurante vegetariano donde pueda brindar desayuno, almuerzo y cena.
texts.en:
Isabel is one of eight members that make up the Communal Bank “Esperanza para el Futuro” (Hope for the Future). This group is appreciative and commits to working honestly as part of the Prosperity Program.

Isabel was born in Ucayali, but has lived in Nicolás de Piérola-Chosica for more than 20 years. She is married and has five children (ages 34, 33, 27, 22, and 16). Isabel continues to support her youngest child who is about to finish high school. More than three years ago, Isabel started selling honey and olive oil that she acquired during her trips to her birthplace of Ucayali. Most of her customers are neighbors and acquaintances who have supported her. She came up with this idea because she wanted to help her husband with the household expenses.

At 52 years of age, Isabel wants to continue working in a positive manner. Her greatest wish is to see her daughter graduate. The loan she requested will be invested in her business since July is the start of the honey season in her hometown. In the future, Isabel wants to establish a vegetarian restaurant that serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

loans.use: to purchase honey and olive oil to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, stone, gravel, and other supplies for home improvements.

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

She is 44 years old and in a common-law marriage.  The member divides her time between making and selling handicrafts.  She produces caps, socks, and alpaca wool scarves.  The member distributes her goods to different craft stores.  She wants to expand her craft business, so she is requesting a loan to buy alpaca wool so that she can continue making her creations.      

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

texts.es:
L. socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILL.”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco,  y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia tiene 35 años D. edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; L. socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. artesanía, elL. venD. chalinas, chompas, muñecas, pantalones, llaveros entre otros tipos D. artesanía, L. socia también trabaja como odontóloga, elL. tiene un consultorio dental, por medio D. estos trabajos L. socia saca adelante a sus hijos, L. socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. artesanía e implementar su consultorio odontológico. L. socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía y para comprar sillas para su consultorio dental.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
 L. socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Inti QuilL.” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 35 years old, single, and has one child. The member spends part of her time operating a business in which she sells handicrafts such as scarves, sweaters, dolls, trousers, shirts, and other handmaD. items. She also works as a dentist and has her own dental practice. Through these businesses, the member is able to help her children get ahead. The member wants to expand her craft business and keep her dental practice in operation. She is requesting a loan to buy crafts and to acquire chairs for her dental office.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase chairs for her dental office and merchandise for her craft business.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Virgilio’s San Benito, Texas-based stone memorial business, D. A. Monuments, is a uniquely community-oriented company. Virgilio prides himself in serving seniors in his Hispanic community by offering them reasonably priced, high quality products. His aim, he says, is to help these seniors provide respectable, well-crafted monuments for their loved ones that fit into their small and often fixed-income budgets.

Virgilio’s business, which he began 15 years ago, makes stone memorial monuments for cemeteries. The ideas to start his business came to him while working at a funeral home, during which time he started to create monuments for the customers there. When people began to comment on how much they liked his work and asked for more of his products, Virgilio opened the doors to D. A. Monuments.

Currently, he sells his products directly to members of the Hispanic community and has contracts with various cemeteries in his area. The business has grown enough in the past 15 years to support two full-time employees and two others who are on-call. However, even with these employees, the amount of sketching, measuring, and designing necessary to fill his monument orders was causing Virgilio to work ten to twelve hour days, including weekends. As a result, he decided to modernize his business, utilizing cutting-edge computer design equipment to save time and allow his business to take on more orders.

Virgilio used his loan to purchase a computer system called Monu-Cad, worth $15,000, which allows him to map out the design of his products on the computer. It dramatically cuts down on the amount of work he has to do; he says what used to take 24 hours can now be done in an hour and a half. His is the only business that offers that type of quick service in his town, and he is now able to produce and sell significantly more products.

In the future, Virgilio hopes to continue offering the affordable, reliable products for his community members along with gaining more large contracts with cemeteries. Since his loan freed up a lot of time that would otherwise be spent hand-designing his products, he believes that he can now truly begin growing into larger markets. 

His 15 years in business has led Virgilio to offer the following advice on frugality and fiscal responsibility to aspiring business-owners: “You can’t live a luxurious life because your business will claim it; you have to be cautious with your expenditures.” With this knowledge and his newly modernized workplace, Virgilio hopes to continue serving the monument needs of his customers and his community.

loans.use: to pay for computer software to design cemetary monuments

loans.name: Queta

texts.es: Queta tiene 54 años, una mujer sencilla vive junto a David, su esposo. Ambos tienen 3 hijas, de las cuales dos viven con ellos, en su casa propia, ubicado en una zona céntrica de la ciudad de Tarma, puesto que la mayor labora en Lima en busca de mejores oportunidades económicas. El amor a la cocina,  encontrar una manera de distraerse y generar ingresos económicos para cubrir los gastos domésticos, hicieron que Queta, inicie el negocio de venta de comida. En un espacio de su casa acondicionó un comedor, el que ahora es su restaurante. De eso hace 5 años aproximadamente, donde atiende a diario  a sus exigentes clientes en la hora de almuerzo, cada plato de comida lo vende a 5 soles y los días domingo a 7 soles. Uno de los restaurantes más caros de la zona pues la exquisita sazón que tiene lo merece.  Ella, asegura que le gusta mucho cocinar y ver como sus comensales disfrutan de sus alimentos, sin embargo le disgusta demorar en la comprar de los insumos para cada preparación, porque tiene que ser muy selecta con lo que compra, por eso realiza sus compras para toda la semana excepto las verduras. Se siente muy feliz ya que su esposo labora como docente de educación superior en la especialidad de “Contabilidad”, “Economía” y “Administración” en el Centro Educativo “Santa Lucía”, con el tiempo, quiere incrementar más su negocio con otros productos como repostería y dulcería. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Taruma” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Queta, de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la preparación de alimentos.
texts.en:
Queta, age 54, is a modest woman who lives with her husband David. They have three daughters who live with them in the own home in a central area of the city of Tarma, where most of the residents work in Lima because of the better economic opportunities. Her love is cooking because it provides her with a distraction and a means of generating an income to cover household expenses. Queta started her food business by setting aside a space in her house and equipping it as a diner, but now it is a restaurant. She has been in business for approximately five years and attends to her customers every day during the lunch hour. Each plate of food sells for 5 PEN and on Sundays the price is 7 PEN. Even though her business is one of the more expensive restaurants in the area, the exquisite taste of her food justifies the price. Queta says that she enjoys cooking and seeing her customers enjoy their food. However, she dislikes the delays caused by having to buy supplies for each preparation because she is very selective with her purchases. For this reason, she buys everything she needs for the entire week except vegetables. Queta is very happy that her husband is a college instructor at the Santa Lucia Educational Center where he teaches courses in accounting, economics, and management. Within time, she wants to expand her business by adding other products such as pastries and candy.

Queta is a member of the Communal Bank “Taruma” and receiving her tenth loan with MFP. She hopes to work together with the other members so that they can follow through with their plans. Once again, she promises to complete her payments just like she did with her previous loans. Queta appreciates being part of her Communal Bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. With the support received, she plans to invest the requested funds in the purchase of necessary supplies for the preparation of her dishes.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for the preparation of her dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, stone, gravel, and other supplies for home improvements.

loans.name: Eveling Yesenia

texts.es:
Eveling, habita en la ciudad de león, tiene 36 años de edad, esta casada, tiene una hija, de oficio comerciante ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, ella estudio computación. Ella tenia 20 años de edad cuando inicio en este negocio ayudando a su madre pues ella también se dedicaba a lo mismo, tenia una tienda que ella atendía, con el paso del tiempo ella se independizo de su madre y puso su propia tienda. Hoy en día ella vende ambulante por toda la ciudad de león, además de vender en su casa que es donde tiene la tienda su esposo la ayuda el aporta con lo que gana de su trabajo.
Solicito el crédito para comprar mercadería de ropa y cosméticos. Con esta inversión espera aumentar sus ventas y ofrecer mas variedad de productos. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta poner una tienda de mercadería en general  en el mercado.
texts.en:
Eveling lives in the city of León. She is 36 years old, married, and has a daughter. Eveling is a merchant who sells clothing and cosmetics. She studied computer science. Eveling started her business when she was 20 years old and had the help of her mother, who was in the same line of work and managed a store. As time passed, Eveling became independent from her mother and opened her own store. Today she sells as a traveling merchant throughout the entire city of León. She also sells from the store in her home. Her husband helps to support her with whatever he earns from his job.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, such as clothing and cosmetics. With this investment, she hopes to increase her sales and offer a wider variety of products. Her future plans include opening a general merchandise store at the market.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María D. 52 años, es una mujer laboriosa, resiD. en L. ciudad D. Tarma junto a Víctor, su esposo. Ambos tiene 4 hijos pero sólo viven con el menor D. todos en una casa alquilada, también tiene una vivienda propia pero por su negocio arrienda el establecimiento para sus costuras. Mujer ejemplar y buena madre D. familia, así definimos a esta mujer que desD. hace 10 años, viene dedicándose a L. costura D. prendas D. vestir. Tiene muchos clientes, por L. creatividad y diseño que ejerce al remendar pantalones, blusas y demás prendas. Además D. aprovechar está actividad y generar mayores ingresos económicos; venD. dulces, galletas, caramelos, bebidas gasificas y algunos productos D. primera necesidad, con L. ayuda D. su madre, mientras su pareja trabaja como pintor D. fachadas D. pared y en cualquier labor eventual que se le presente, también le ayuda a elL., en L. costura, ya que juntos tratan D. salir adelante. Lo que más le gusta es diseñar y coser, por otro lado le incomoda lavar y planchar las prendas pues tiene que ser muy cuidadosa para que sus clientes regresen, estos  son muy rentables porque les permite tener una vida cómoda y sin preocupaciones, aparte D. tener una ventaja en L. ubicación D. su negocio ya que es una zona comercial. Su meta ahora, es incrementar su tienda con productos comestibles, para generar más utilidades. ElL. pertenece al banco comunal “Taruma” y este es el undécimo crédito con MFP, donD. espera D. un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. María, D. recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero que solicita, en L. compra D. productos D. primera necesidad. para surtir mejor L. mercadería D. su tienda.
texts.en:
María, age 52, is an industrious woman who resides in the city of Tarma with her husband Víctor. They have four children, but only the youngest child lives with them in a rented home. María and her husband also own a house, but it is being used for her sewing business. She is an exemplary woman and a good mother to her family. For the past 10 years, María has been making clothes. She has many customers who appreciate her creativity and designs. María also makes alterations to trousers, blouses, and other articles of clothing. She takes advantage of her customer base to generate more income by selling candy, cookies, caramels, sodas, and a few other basic necessities with the help of her mother. Meanwhile, her husband works as a house painter and takes on any job that is presented to him. He also helps her with the sewing and they work together in order to get ahead. What she enjoys most is designing and sewing. However, she feels uncomfortable washing and ironing clothes. She knows that she has to be very careful so that her customers will continue to do business. Her businesses have been very profitable and allowed her to live a comfortable life without worries. She also has the advantage of her business being situated in a commercial area. Her current goal is to expand her food store so that she can generate more profit.

María is a member of the Communal Bank “Taruma” and is receiving her 11th loan with MFP. She hopes that this small loan will enable her to achieve her goals. Once again, she promises to complete her payments just as she did with her previous loans. In addition, she is grateful to be part of her Communal Bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. With the money she requested, María will invest in the purchase of basic necessities so that she will have more inventory in her store.

loans.use: to purchase basic necessities for her store.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, es un hombre emprendedor que está cumpliendo sus metas, tiene 52 años. Vive en la ciudad de Tarma en la casa de sus padres; junto a su esposa Dina, de 45 años y su hijo, aparte tiene un hijo mayor de su primer compromiso, que vive en la ciudad de Huancayo por motivos académicos. Junto a su esposa y el menor de sus hijos. Jesús, todas la tardes de 5  a11 de la noche, abre las puertas de su fuente de soda, donde ofrece a sus comensales deliciosas hamburguesas,  pollo a la brasa (pollo aderezado con comino pimienta, sal, ajos y un poco de kion, frito en aceite caliente, se sirve acompañado de papas fritas y ensalada de lechuga), además de bebidas gasificas y bebidas calientes como café, té, mate. Unidos y con mucho esmero; está familia lleva 10 años en este negocio, y según cuentan, a diario vende de 250 a 300 soles, porque sus comensales ya conocen el exquisito sabor que brinda, también la manera acogedora de atender al público. Lo que más le gusta es trozar la carne de pollo en porciones, sin embargo le disgusta pelar las papas para freírlas, su negocio es muy rentable por la concurrencia de clientes fieles que tiene, además de encontrarse en un lugar concurrido y comercial. Por eso, quiere incrementar más su negocio, con productos de primera necesidad, además, piensa ampliarlo hasta que sea un restaurante. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Taruma” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Jesús, de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para preparar hamburguesas y pollo a la brasa, también planea comprar una licuadora.
texts.en:
Jesús, age 52, is an enterprising gentleman who is able to achieve his goals. He lives in the city of Tarma in the home of his parents with his wife Dina, age 45, and their son. Jesús also has a grown child from his first marriage who lives in the city of Huancayo to attend school. Together with his wife and younger child, Jesús operates a soda fountain. His business is open every evening from 5pm to 11pm. He offers his guests hamburgers and grilled chicken (which is seasoned with salt, pepper, garlic, and a pinch of ginger). These dishes are served with fries and a salad. Jesús also offers sodas and hot beverages such as coffee, tea, and mate. He and his family have maintained their business with great care for 10 years. Jesús says his daily sales range between 250 to 300 PEN because his customers are already familiar with the exquisite taste of his food. He also creates a welcoming atmosphere for the public. What he enjoys most is butchering the chickens into portions, but he dislikes peeling potatoes in order to make fries. His business is very profitable because he has loyal customers and is located in a busy commercial area. For this reason, Jesús wants to expand his business. By acquiring more inventory, he believes he can convert his business to a full-size restaurant.

Jesús is a member of the Communal Bank “Taruma” and is receiving his ninth loan with MFP. He hopes that this small loan will help him achieve his goals. Once again, he promises to complete his payments just as he did with his previous loans. In addition, he is grateful to be part of the Communal Bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. With the money he requested, Jesús will buy a blender and supplies for making hamburgers and grilled chicken.

loans.use: to purchase a blender and supplies for making hamburgers and grilled chicken.

loans.name: Cándida Rosa

texts.es: La Sra. Cándida Rosa  ella Trabaja por cuenta propia con su pulpería el cual lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación el cual es administrado por ella misma y su esposo, tiene siete años de tener su negocio actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha obtenido  once créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de mercadería para invertirle a su negocio y así ampliarlo y darle mejor atención a su clientela, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Cándida Rosa is self-employed and has a small grocery store located in her home. She and her husband have run the store for seven years. They currently have one school-age child. 

She has received eleven loans through CEPRODEL and she has used each one to purchase merchandise in order to invest in her business. As such she has expanded the business and provided better service to her clientele. The loans from CEPRODEL have greatly benefitted her. Through these loans she has improved her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Darwin

texts.es: Darwin de 35 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Nelly de 26 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Manejando su motocarro, Darwin ayuda en los gastos del hogar a su familia, sabe que tiene una gran responsabilidad en su hogar, puesto que siente que es el sustento principal de la casa y quiere corresponder todo el cariño que le brinda su familia. Él es muy amable con sus clientes y siempre los recibe con una sonrisa en los labios. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus pasajeros, lleva 20 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es tener que estar todo el día fuera de casa en busca de clientes, pero sabe que ese es su trabajo y que tiene que cumplirlo, espera tener en el futuro el dinero necesario para comprar otro motocarro y ponerlo a trabajar. Este será el séptimo crédito con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en sus pagos, ya que no quiere crearle problemas a su banco comunal, en el cual participa activamente y es un socio muy querido. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará nuevas llantas para su motocarro, ya que con el paso del tiempo se han ido desgastando.
texts.en:
Darwin is 35 years old. He is a very simple man and a worker. He lives in his own home together with his wife Nelly, who is 26 years old, and their three dear children. He wants to provide them with a better quality of life. By driving his motorized rickshaw Darwin helps with the household expenses. He knows that he has a great responsibility within his home. He knows that he is the mainstay of the home and he wants to return all of the love that his family gives him. 

He is very friendly to his customers and always greets them with a smile on his lips. What he likes best about his job is chatting with his passengers. He has worked in this field for 20 years and believes that the most difficult part of his job is having to be away from home all day looking for customers.  However, he knows that this is his job and he has to do it. He hopes that in the future he will have the necessary money to buy another motorized rickshaw and put it to work.

This will be his seventh loan with MFP. He hopes to be very punctual with his payments because he does not want to create problems with his community bank where he has participated actively and is a well-loved member. He will buy new tires for his motorized rickshaw with the 500 nuevos soles that he has requested because over time they have worn down.

loans.use: to buy new tires.

loans.name: Mary

texts.es: Mary, de 38 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Emilio de 42 años y sus 5 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Visitando a sus clientes en sus mismas casas, Mary realiza la venta de sus productos de belleza, es una vendedora muy persistente y convincente, motivo por el cual termina con las ventas de sus cosméticos rápidamente. En la ciudad de Pucallpa es muy conocida y saben que los productos que vende son de muy buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejarles a sus clientas sobre lo que mejor le quedara a su rostro, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cobrar, por la venta de sus productos, ya que no siempre sus clientes tienen plata para pagarle, pero ella siempre se las arregla para que le paguen completamente todas sus ventas. Para más adelante, espera poner su tienda de cosméticos, donde pueda vender mas cómoda y sin la necesidad de ir casa por casa. Este será el décimo tercer crédito con MFP, quiere hacer crecer su negocio, es por eso que desea pagar a tiempo todas sus cuotas para poder acceder a otro préstamo, además sabe que cuenta con el apoyo de su banco comunal. Con los novecientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más cosméticos, ya que últimamente esta teniendo una mayor demanda.
texts.en: Mary, age 38, is a very straightforward and likable woman. She lives in her own house together with her husband Emilio, age 42, and her 5 beloved children, for whom she would like to provide a better quality of life. Visiting her customers in their own homes, Mary sells her beauty products, and she is a very persistent and convincing salesperson, so that she quickly finalizes her cosmetics sales. She is very well known in the city of Pucallpa, and people know that the products she sells are of very good quality. What she likes most about her work is advising her customers about what will look best on their faces. She has done this work for 8 years, and she thinks the hardest part is collecting payments after she sells her products, because not all of her customers have the money to pay her. However, she always works it out so that all of her sales are completely paid for. For the future, she hopes to set up a cosmetics store where she can sell more comfortably and without the need to go from house to house. This will be her thirteenth loan with MFP, and because she wants to keep expanding her business, she is determined to make all of her payments on time so that she can have access to additional loans. She also knows that she has the support of her communal bank. With the nine hundred Peruvian new soles she is requesting, she will buy more cosmetics, because recently she has been experiencing greater demand.

loans.use: to stock up on additional cosmetics.

loans.name: Juana Jacinta

texts.es: La Sra. Juana  Jacinta  ella es trabajadora activa del Ministerio de Educación trabajando para el colegio Público los “Navarrete” desempeñándose como Directora del Colegio tiene  Catorce  años  de trabajar para esta institución es casada  actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha obtenido  once créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Juana Jacinta is an active worker with the Ministry of Education. She works for the “Navarrete” public school, in the position of School Director. She has worked for this institution for fourteen years. She is married and has two children who are currently of school age. She has obtained eleven loans from CEPRODEL, and each one of them has been used to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, stones, stone tiles, concrete blocks, etc., to expand and improve the house where she lives. The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly, since they have allowed her to improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, stones, stone tiles, concrete blocks, etc.

loans.name: Wilma Liliana

texts.en: Wilma is 22 years old and lives in Salcedo, in central Ecuador. She is married and lives with her husband and one son in their own house. She is hardworking and supports her family through the production of milk. Wilma began working in milk production because it was a family tradition. She is seeking her first loan to purchase a young bull. She hopes that this loan and the purchase of the bull will help her profitability in the future. Wilma's goal is to obtain more land to live and work on. In the photo, Wilma is pictured with a few of her other animals.

loans.use: to buy a young bull

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Licenia

texts.en: Maria Licenia is 44 years old and lives in Salcedo, Ecuador. She is married and lives with her husband. She has three grown children aged 26, 23 and 20 years. Maria Licenia is a hard worker and a good example for her family. She is seeking this loan to buy a young bull. Maria Licenia works in agriculture because it was the tradition of her parents. She hopes that she will experience the utility of credit with this loan, her first, and that it will help her animals to grow. Her future dream is to own a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy a young bull

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Eriberto Antonio

texts.es:
Don Eriberto de oficio mecanico, labora a una empresa del estado. Casado, y con sus hijos independiente, su esposa labora en servivios domestico apoyandose mutuamente para lograr juntos las mejoras.
Eriberto ha tenido dificultades con su terreno ya que queda enbajada y que por recursos economicos no logro comprar otro terreno. Es por eso que logro levantar un muro para la retencion del agua y que no se siguiera devordando la tierra, el cual esta casi terminado gracias al apoyo economico que Afodenic ha dado en cuatro ciclos, siendo usados para las mejora de su vivienda.
Con este nuevo prestamo seguira levantando la pared del muro que quedo pendiente y que es de gran relevancia terminar, lo que comprara: cemento, piedra, arena, hirro, y dos camionada de tierra para rellenar su terreno, y poder dar mejor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Eriberto is a Mechanic; he works for a state firm.  He’s married and his children live independently.  His wife works as a domestic employee supporting each other to attain improvements together.

Eriberto has had some difficulties with his property because it’s located on a down slope and because of his limited economic resources was unable to buy a different lot.  He managed to build a retention wall to keep water from eroding away the land.  It’s almost finished thanks to economic help from Afodenic which has given him four cycles that were used for home improvements.

He will use this loan to continue the construction still to be completed of the wall which is very important to finish.  He will buy cement, stone, sand, iron rods and two truck loads of dirt to fill in the lot and provide more security for his family.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Silvia Leticia

texts.en: Silvia is 22 years old and lives in Salcedo, in central Ecuador. She is married and lives with her husband and 3-year-old son. She is a hardworking woman who supports her family. Silvia works in milk production, having followed the example of her parents, who were also agricultural workers. She is seeking this loan in order to purchase a young bull. This is her first loan and it is a small amount with which she hopes to experience the helpfulness of credit. Her future dream is to buy her own land.

loans.use: to purchase a young bull

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Raymundo

texts.es: Raymundo de 27 años, convive con ketty de 30 años, que fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos. Juntos viven en una casa alquilada ubicada en la comunidad de Puerto Mayo del distrito de Pichari. Él es un joven con grandes expectativas por el futuro, es agricultor y desde muy joven estuvo dedicándose a esta actividad en el terreno de sus señores padres. Ahora él desea emprender un nuevo negocio en la crianza de pollos, ya que vio una buena demanda, ya que los pollos que se expenden en su localidad son traídos desde la capital y llegan con un precio elevado. Es esto que a él le motiva incursionar en este tipo de negocio, ya que tuvo como experiencia la crianza de pollos que lo realizaba en la ciudad de pisco. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con los 1.000 nuevos soles invertirá  para implementar su galpón.
texts.en:
Raymundo, 27, lives with Ketty, 30; they have two children.  They live together in a rented house in the community of Puerto Mayo in Pichari District.  

He is a young man with great expectations for the future.  He’s a farmer having started this occupation on his parents’ land while still very young.  Now, he wants to start a new business raising chickens since he noticed that they are in high demand and because chickens sold in his community are brought in from the capital and are very high priced.  This is what motivates him to go into this type of business; he’s had experience raising chickens, something he did in the city of Pisco.  This is his first loan with MFP and he hopes support from each of you.  He will use the 1000 new soles to equip his shed.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies to equip his shed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ear medicine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Lenin Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Lenin Antonio  él es trabajador activo de la Alcaldía Municipal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Inspector Ambiental  tiene  dos años  de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente, tiene dos hijo en edad escolar. Ha obtenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para invertir en el negocio de Reciclaje para tener ese otro ingreso de dinero, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Lenin Antonio works for city hall in San Rafael del Sur as an Environmental Inspector. He’s been working for this institution for two years.  He’s married and has two school age children.

He’s gotten seven CEPRODEL loans that he used to buy building materials and supplies to enlarge and improve his home.  He’s asking for this loan to invest in a recycling business in order to have an additional source of income.  Ceprodel loans have been very beneficial for him in that he’s improved his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in a recycling business.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es: Rita tiene 30 años, vive soL. en su casa que posee en el campo. A lo largo D. su vida aprendió todo lo fundamental para desempeñarse como una buena agricultora, desD. su niñez sus padres forjaron en elL.  los conocimientos y habilidades que hoy le sirven y que son su sustento económico. Es así que cultiva papa, maíz y alfalfa, cuyos productos una vez cosechados son llevados para su venta. Asume los riesgos que significa dedicarse a L. agricultura ya que en varias oportunidades las condiciones climáticas afectaron seriamente sus cultivos ocasionándole  pérdidas, por lo tanto se dedica también al engorD. D. animales que le ayuda a sostenerse económicamente. Se entero D. MFP, por medio D. su vecino que L. invitó a formar parte D. un grupo y fue D. su interés ya que necesitaba en ese entonces liquidez para invertir en su siembra, desD. entonces ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos. En esta ocasión el dinero le servirá para sembrar maíz para lo cual comprará sacos D. abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Rita is 30 years old.  She lives alone in a house she has in the countrysiD..  Throughout her life she’s learned all the basics to be a good farmer.  Since childhood her parents instilled knowledge and skills in her that today serve as her means of support.  She grows potatoes, corn and alfalfa which, once harvested, she sells.  She accepts risks inherent in farming since on several occasions weather conditions severely affected her crops causing losses sometimes.  Because of this, she also raises animals to help support herself economically.

She found out about MFP through a neighbor who invited her to form part of a group.  This interested here because she was in need of cash liquidity to invest in her planting.  Since then, she’s been punctual with her repayments.  On this occasion, the money will be used for her corn crops; she will buy sacks of organic manure.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Nemecia Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Nemecia Esperanza  ella es trabajadora activa de la empresa Ministerio de Educación desempeñándose como Docente de Secundaria en el colegio publico los "Espinocita" tiene  veinte y seis años  de trabajar para esta institución es soltera  actualmente. Ha obtenido  diez créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Nemecia Esperanza works as a Secondary School Teacher for the Ministry of Education in the “Espinocita” public school.  She’s been working for this institution for twenty-six years.  She’s single currently.  

She’s had ten CEPRODEL loans that she used to buy building materials and supplies like: sand, cement, stone, gravel, concrete blocks, etc. to enlarge and improve her home.  Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit for her in that she’s improved her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Gladys María

texts.es: La Sra. Gladys María  ella es trabajadora activa de la Empresa Ministerio de Educación desempeñándose como Maestra de Educación Primaria en el colegio Publico "Felix Pedro García" tiene  cuatro  años  de trabajar para esta institución, es casada actualmente. Ha obtenido quince créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo solicito para la compra de una maya quirúrgica para la operación de su papa,  los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys María works for the Ministry of Education as an Elementary School Teacher at the “Felix Pedro García” public school.  She’s been working for this institution for four years.  She’s currently married.

She’s had fifteen CEPRODEL loans that she used to buy building materials and supplies like sand, dement, stone, gravel, concrete blocks, etc. to enlarge and improve her home.

This loan is requested to buy surgical mesh for her father’s surgery.  Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit for her in that they have allowed her to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy surgical mesh for her father's surgery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Eveling Del Carmen

texts.es: La Señora Eveling Del Carmen tiene su negocio que es la venta de cosméticos, ella tiene 54 años y es casada. Ella realiza sus actividades diarias del hogar antes de salir a vender a ofrecer sus diferentes productos, Eveling trabaja desde las 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 8 la noche por lo que siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar sus ingresos. Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar polvos, cremas, perfumes y tratamientos. Por lo que se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Eveling Del Carmen’s business is selling Cosmetics.  She is 54 years old and married.  She does her domestic chores every day before going out to sell her various products.  Eveling works from 8am until 8pm because she’s always looking for ways to improve her income.

She’s asking for the loan to buy powder, cream, perfume and treatments.  She commits to make her installment payments according to the established payment plan.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria De Los Ángeles se dedica a la venta de refrescos y cosméticos, hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy buena experiencia ella trabaja duro todos los días. Trabaja de lunes a viernes desde muy temprano por lo que tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, su mayor desafío ha sido dedicarse a su negocio y a sus hijos pues ambos necesitan de su atención. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de frutas, azúcar, bolsas y pajillas. Sueña con proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Maria de los Ángeles sells softdrinks and cosmetics.  She has been in business for six years and has gained a lot of experience working hard every day.  Monday through Friday she starts work very early in the morning.  She has two children in her care and her greatest challenge is dividing her time to give both her business and her children all the attention they need.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fruit, sugar, bags and straws.  Her goal for the future is to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: To buy fruit, sugar, bags and straws.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Maria Del Carmen se dedica a un kiosco ubicado en las afueras del hospital. Dio inicio a este negocio desde hace 1 año, inicio con fondos propios y poco a poco fue reinvirtiendo en su negocio de tal manera que pudiera vender cierta variedad de productos.  Ella afirma que su objetivo al establecer este negocio fue buscando una fuente alternativa para brindarle manutención a sus hijos, sin embargo este negocio les ha servido muchísimo para salir adelante, ya que sus hijos pueden tener la oportunidad de estudiar. Actualmente está solicitando este crédito para la compra de jugos, refrescos, galletas, pan, golosinas y gaseosas.
texts.en: Doña Maria del Carmen runs a stand located just outside the hospital.  She started her business a year ago with her own money and little by little has been able to re-invest in her business and offer a variety of products.  She claims her goal was to find an alternative means of income for her children and it has certainly helped them get ahead, since her children are getting an education.  She is requesting a loan to buy juices, softdrinks, cookies, bread, sweets and sodas.

loans.use: To buy juices, softdrinks, cookies, bread, sweets and sodas.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William vive en su casa propia, queda en Tapo, Anexo de Pazos, ciudad de Huancayo. Desde hace 2 años  trabaja vendiendo leña, que él mismo los extrae de árboles de eucalipto que han sido cultivado en años anteriores. Pero él compra los árboles por extensión de terreno y con ayuda de su herramienta de trabajo, que es su sierra eléctrica. Es así que su trabajo consiste en cortar la leña en trozos y venderlos al por mayor a los comerciantes mayoristas. Su esposa la apoya en la administración y en el ingreso y egreso de su negocio. Siempre tiene cuidado de extraer los árboles, dejando  solo las raíces para que nuevamente broten nuevamente. Siente mucha satisfacción de su trabajo y su deseo es comprar extensiones de terreno no solo de árboles de eucalipto sino también para extender el cultivo de maíz, ya que es una de sus actividades que también realiza. Es su segundo crédito con MFP,  fue animado por uno de sus familiares a formar un grupo solidario que actualmente integra. Se siente muy motivado de continuar trabajando de manera grupal porque confía en la responsabilidad de sus demás integrantes y porque cada crédito que recibe le ayuda a mejorar su capital de trabajo. Con este monto de dinero comprará más troncos de eucalipto y pagar el flete de transporte de la leña que produzca.
texts.en: William lives in his own house in Tapo, Anexo de Pazos in the city of Huancayo.  For two years he has been selling firewood which he gets from the eucalyptus trees planted years before.  He buys the trees by strips of land and uses an electric saw as his work tool.  His wife helps with administration of accounts receivable and payable.  He is always careful when cutting the tree trunks, leaving the roots so a new tree can sprout.  He is very satisfied with his work and wants to buy more strips of land, not only of eucalyptus but also to grow corn, since he also has experience in this area.  This is his second loan through MFP.  One of his relatives encouraged him to set up a communal bank.  He is very motivated to keep working in a group sense because he trusts the responsibility of the other members and because each loan he receives helps him improve his working capital.  With this loan he plans to buy more ecualyptus tree trunks and pay for the firewood shipping costs.

loans.use: To buy eucalyptus tree trunks.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza De Batuco Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “La Nueva Esperanza de Batuco” está conformado por 16 integrantes, que se dedican a diversos rubros, entre ellos, comerciantes ambulantes, carpinteros, cocinería, venta de abarrotes, mecánica y venta de ropa de segunda mano. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Colina ciudad de Santiago.
Margarita quien en la foto se encuentra ubicada en el cuarto lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste una falda larga color gris y usa anteojos. Ella se dedica a la marroquinería industria de artículos de mica y/o cuero, como carteras, bolsos y billeteras. Específicamente realiza mochilas y estuches. Presta sus servicios y vende sus productos al por mayor en comercios establecidos y marcas reconocidas con gran prestigio. Se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 8 años. Margarita comenta que fue autodidacta para aprender el oficio. Durante los meses entre septiembre a mayo, sus ventas aumentan, ya que es la temporada más alta del año. Cuando no realiza ventas al por mayor, se dedica a vender al detalle en ferias libres. Su taller está ubicado en su nuevo domicilio, ubicado en la comuna de Batuco. Ahí cuenta con cinco máquinas industriales. Su horario es totalmente flexible, además comenta que es un negocio familiar. 
Los insumos necesarios para su negocio los compra en el barrio Independencia, Patronato y Rosas, comenta además que es muy popular en éstos comercios, ya que es cliente antigua y habitual. 
Con el crédito comprará una cortadora industrial para engomado. 
Sus metas en su negocio son vender sus propios diseños en bolsos, mochilas y estuches. Además comprar un vehículo para trasladar su mercadería, ya que resulta muy sacrificado cargar el peso de las mochilas.
Sus sueños son tener un local establecido, para fabricar y vender sus productos de forma más tranquila.
Margarita vive junto a su esposo, una hija de 25 años y su nieto de 8 años de edad. Además otra hija que estudia y le ayuda en su negocio. 
Ella está muy agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, no solo por el crédito sino también por los valores que fomenta Fondo Esperanza, en cuanto a la solidaridad, la unión y la confianza.
Colina es una comuna de la región metropolitana (donde está Santiago, capital de Chile) ubicada al norte de la misma. Actualmente es centro de importantes inversiones, principalmente en el área agro industrial, debido a la instalación de grandes e importantes empresas, que de paso entregan un gran número de empleos a la comunidad. Es también un área de parcelaciones de agrado, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar considerablemente el número de habitantes. También cuenta con espacios adecuados al turismo, tales como termas, deporte en la Laguna Piedra Roja y montañismo.
texts.en:
“La Nueva Esperanza de Batuco” community bank has 16 members who all work in different businesses including: itinerant sales, carpentry, cooking, grocery sales, vehicle repairs and second-hand clothes sales.  All the members of this group live in Colina neighborhood, in the city of Santiago.

Margarita is the fourth person from the right in the photo.  She is wearing a long gray skirt and is wearing glasses.  She makes leather goods such as briefcases, purses and billfolds.  She also makes backpacks and cases.  She provides her services and sells her products wholesale in established businesses and to prestigious, well-known brands. She has been in this line of work for 8 years.  Margarita tells us that she taught herself this trade.  Between September and May her sales increase since this is the busiest season of the year.  When she is not selling wholesale, she sells retail in street markets.  Her workshop is located in her new home which is in the town of Batuco.  She has five industrial machines.

Margarita's working hours are totally flexible.  She tells us that hers is a family business.  She buys the supplies that she needs for her business in the Independencia, Patronato and Rosas neighborhoods.  She tells us that she is very popular there as she is a long-standing and frequent customer.  

With her loan, Margarita will buy an industrial cutting machine.  Her goals for her business are to sell her own designs of bags, backpacks and cases.  She would also like to buy a vehicle for transporting her merchandise as it is very hard to manage the weight of the backpacks.  Her dreams are to own her own established business premises where she can make and sell her products more peacefully.

Margarita lives together with her husband, her 25 year-old daughter, and her 8 year-old grandson.  She also has another daughter who is studying and helps her in her business.  She is very grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza has given her, not only as regards the loan but also as regards the values that Fondo Esperanza promote regarding solidarity, unity and trust.

Colina is a neighborhood in the Metropolitana region (where Santiago, the capital of Chile, is located).  Colina is in the north of the region.  It is currently the center of important investments, mainly in the agro-industrial field, owing to the establishment of big, important companies who provide a lot of jobs to the local community.  It is also an area which has pleasant subdivisions, which have significantly increased the number of inhabitants.  Furthermore, it offers tourist spots such as thermal baths, sports on the Piedra Roja lake and mountaineering.

loans.use: to buy an industrial cutting machine

loans.name: José Marcial

texts.es: El Sr. se desempeña como electricista industrial   tiene  Veinte y dos    años de trabajar en esta área, es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  cinco  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la  agricultura, siembra de maíz, estos créditos los paga con cuotas mensuales de sus ingresos en la empresa, estos créditos le benefician para el desarrollo y mejora del nivel de vida de su familia ya que al vender la cosecha tiene la oportunidad de realizar inversiones en mejoras de la vivienda e incluso para la compra de electrodomésticos.
texts.en:
Jose is employed as an industrial electrician. He has been in this occupation for 22 years, and is presently married. 

Jose has had 5 loans with CEPRODEL, each was invested in agriculture, sowing corn. He paid off these loans with monthly deductions from his earnings in the enterprise. The loans helped him to develop and improved the standard of living of his family.  As Jose sold each harvest, he has taken the opportunity to invest in home improvements and even to buy domestic electrical appliances.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca es natural de Huancavelica  y radica en la ciudad de Huancayo desde hace más de 15 años al lado de sus 2 hijos en la casa que años atrás había comprado. Hace más de 11 años ubicó el negocio adecuado para desarrollarla, ya que se dedica a la venta de artículos para el hogar hechos artesanalmente a base de madera. Junto con la ayuda de sus 2 hijos que viajan constantemente a otras ciudades aledañas a su zona  aprovechando sus días de feria comercial, de esa forma tiene ganancias semanales  que le sirven para el sustento de su hogar. La mercadería que vende lo obtiene de amigos que son artesanales, que trabajan con la madera y cada vez se perfecciona más y eso le da ventaja en las ventas. Los diseños que elaboran son atractivos a la vista de sus clientes, es por eso que éste negocio le ha sido rentable por lo que ha podido ahorrar y mejorar su calidad de vida. Supo de MFP por medio de un folleto informativo que le otorgaron, es así que solicito informes de las condiciones de crédito y concluyo que era lo mejor aliado para mejorar su negocio y en esta ocasión es la segunda vez que esta solicitando un préstamo. Que invertirá en la compra de más objetos artesanales y aumentar así su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Francisca is a native of Huancavelica and has lived in the city of Huancayo for more than 15 years alongside her two children in the house that she bought years before. More than 11 years ago, she situated the right business to develop it since she is dedicated to selling items for the home, made artisanally out of wood. With the help of her two children who travel constantly to other surrounding cities in their area near to market trading days, she has weekly earnings that help her support the home. She obtains the merchandise that she sells from friends who are artisans, who work with wood and each time perfect more and this gives her an advantage in sales. The designs that they make are attractive to her customers' eye. It is due to this that her business has been profitable and she has been able to save and improve her quality of life. She learned about MFP through an information pamphlet that was given to her. In this way, she requested information about the loan terms and concluded that it was the best ally to improve her business and, on this occasion, it is the second time that she is requesting a loan which she will invest in the purchase of more artisanal objects and expand her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase more craft products.

loans.name: Nely

texts.es: La Sra. Nely vive en la zona 18 de Marzo en casa familiar con  su esposo y su hijita de 1 año de edad, cuenta con una tiendita de barrio en su mismo domicilio y por las noches vende cena (comida), su tiendita tiene varios años y  la venta de comida desde hace 1 año en la cual le esta yendo bien ya que el crédito solicitado es para compra de mercaderia para surtir su tienda y también para la compra de abarrotes para la elaboración de  comida ya que tiene mucha demanda por ser la única tienda por el lugar, es muy conocida por sus clientas,  la Sra. Nely quedo muy agradecida por la confianza depositada en su persona.
texts.en: Nely lives in the 18 de Marzo zone of Santa Cruz with her husband and 1-year-old daughter. She runs a small general store from her home, and in the evening, she also serves meals. Her shop is several years old, but she has only been serving dinner for about a year. So far, it's going well. She has asked for a loan so that she can buy more merchandise for her shop and groceries for food preparation. Because her shop is the only one in the neighbourhood, Nely is quite well known, and she is is thankful for the confidence her customers have in her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her general store, as well as groceries for the dinners she sells.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es: Elva, de 37 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo José de 40 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Todos los días muy temprano por la mañana Elva abre su tienda de abarrotes para atender a sus vecinos, ella es una vendedora muy hábil, sabe como tratar a sus clientes y siempre los termina convenciendo de comprar algo más. Su tienda esta muy bien surtida, ya que siempre se preocupa por comprar los productos que le hacen falta. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y enterarse de las cosas que suceden en su barrio. Lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su tienda, sin poder salir a la calle. En adelante espera ampliar las instalaciones de su tienda, para poder vender más productos. Este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, esta dispuesta a ahorrar todos los días un poco, para poder pagar su crédito por completo, en su banco comunal es muy responsable y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan entre socias. Con los mil ochocientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para implementar mejor su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Elva, age 37, is a kind, hard-working woman who lives in her own home with her husband, Jose, age 40, and their four children. One of Elva's goals is to improve their quality of life.

Elva opens her grocery store early each morning for the convenience of her neighbours. She is a highly competent shopkeeper who knows how to serve her customers, and usually convinces them to buy a little something extra. Her shop is well-stocked, and she spends a lot of time tracking down things that are running low. 

Elva has been running her store for three years. Her favourite part of work is talking with customers and finding out what's going on in her neighbourhood. The hardest part is staying in her store all day; she can't go out into the street for any reason. Going forward, Elva wants to increase the shelving space in her store so that she can carry more products. 

This is her seventh loan with MFP. She plans to save a little bit each day so that she can completely pay off her loan. Her community bank considers her a very responsible woman, and she is always respectful of the agreements she makes with other bank members. With the 1800 Soles in this loan, she will buy more merchandise and improve her grocery store.

loans.use: buy more products to improve her grocery store.

loans.name: Maritza Natividad

texts.es: Maritza Natividad es una madre de familia de 32 años. Ella se dedica a una farmacia, ella busca la forma de salir adelante con su negocio, tiene una gran variedad de clientes que asisten a su negocio, ella es una persona muy tranquila y que disfruta de hablar con sus clientes. Maritza desea ampliar su negocio para lograr adquirir más ganancias siempre le ha gustado trabajar para mantener a su familia. Solicita por primera vez un crédito con el objetivo de comprar vitaminas, gotas, pastillas y otros.
texts.en: Maritza Natividad is a 32 year-old mother.  She owns a pharmacy and is looking for a way to get ahead in her business.  She has a wide range of customers who come to her business.  Maritza is a very calm person who enjoys talking to her customers.  She would like to expand her business in order to make more profits.  She has always enjoyed working to support her family.  She is requesting her first loan in order to buy vitamins, drops, pills and other products.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, drops, pills, etc.

loans.name: Sayda Melania

texts.es: La señora Sayda Melania tiene 33 años, tiene un hijo menor de edad, su actividad es una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación. Inicio este negocio hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que siempre busca la forma de mejorar sus ingresos, no ha sido fácil mantener este negocio pues ella ha logrado con mucho sacrificio ha salido adelante. Este financiamiento es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, crema, leche entre otros.
texts.en: Sayda Melania is 33 years old and has one dependent child.  Her business is a grocery store which is located in her home.  She started her business more than seven years ago and is always looking for ways to improve her income.  It hasn't been easy keeping her business running but, with a lot of sacrifice, she has managed to get ahead.  This loan will be used to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, cookies, cream, milk, etc.

loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, bread, cookies, cream, milk, etc.

loans.name: Erika

texts.es: Erika de 27 años, es una mujer muy amable y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Juan de 35 años y su querida hija Kiara de 1 año, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Para Erika la Psicología es una vocación que le viene de familia, puesto que su padre también lo fue y ella decidió seguir sus pasos. Su consultorio esta ubicado en una zona céntrica de la ciudad de Pucallpa, motivo por el cual es muy concurrido y conocido, además sus clientes la prefieren a ella, por la paciencia que tiene para atenderlos. Erika disfruta mucho de ayudar a la gente, ya que gracias a ella sus clientes tienen una mejor salud mental. Lleva 2 años en este trabajo y lo más difícil para ella es tratar a los niños que acuden a su consultorio, puesto que son muy nerviosos y a veces se ponen muy tensos, lo que impide que realice un buen trabajo. Espera que su consultorio crezca y se convierta en una especialista en la materia. Sabe que para eso tiene que trabajar mucho y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de todos ustedes. En su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada, ya que siempre pone orden en las reuniones. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más materiales para su consultorio, para así atender mejor a sus pacientes.
texts.en:
27 year-old Erika is a very kind and cheerful woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 35 year-old Juan, and her beloved daughter, 1 year-old Kiara, who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.

For Erika, psychology is a vocation that comes from her family since her father was a psychologist and she decided to follow in his footsteps.  Her clinic is located in a central area of the city of Pucallpa and so it is very busy and well known.  Her customers prefer to come to her because she is patient in attending to them.  Erika really enjoys helping people.  Thanks to her, her clients enjoy better mental health.  She has been in this job for two years and the most difficult part of her work is treating the children who come to her clinic since they are very nervous and sometimes become very tense which prevents her doing a good job.  She hopes that her clinic will grow and that she will become a specialist in the field.  She knows that in order to achieve this she must work hard and she is ready to do so.

This will be Erika's third loan from MFP and she hopes to receive everyone's support.  She is a very well-respected member of her community bank since she always brings order to the meetings.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more materials for her clinic so that she can better serve her patients.

loans.use: to buy materials to equip her clinic

loans.name: Martha Edelma

texts.es:
Doña Martha, tiene la edad de 52 años,  es pequeña comerciante, su negocio es la reposteria que ella dia a dia hace en su casa de habitacion, pues elabora una variedad de productos, asi como cursos de pasteleria que da,  un cincuenta por ciento de sus ventas es por encargos. Casada, y madre de tres hijos, hoy en dia independientes.
Martha ha venido haciendo mejora a su casa con financiamiento que Afodenic ha otorgado en seis ciclos, en donde ha mejorado mucho. Con es nuevo prestamo hara cambio de tuberias de las aguas negras que han estado dando molestia y que mejorara para el bienestar de la familia mejorando la higiene.
texts.en:
Martha is 52 years old.  She is a small businesswoman and her business is pastry making.  This is something that she does from her home every day.  She makes a variety of products and also gives courses in pastry making.  Fifty percent of her sales are made to order.  Martha is married and has three children who live independently.

Martha has been making improvements to her home through loans received from Afodenic over the course of six loan cycles.  She has made a lot of improvements.  She will use this new loan to replace the sewage pipes in her home as they have been causing problems.  This will improve her family's well-being by improving the hygiene in their home.

loans.use: to buy materials to replace her sewage pipes which are in a bad state of repair

loans.name: Karen Raquel

texts.es: La Sra. Karen, vive en casa Familiar por la zona Oriental, tiene un hijito de 2 años, la Sra. Raquel tiene un auto que lo da a trabajar como taxi ya lleva 3 años con esta actividad, en el transcurso de estos año logro comprarse un lote y esta construyendo un cuarto, el cual el crédito que se le otorgo fue para terminar  su construcción,  la Sra. llego a la institución por recomendación de una de sus amigas que ya tiene crédito por la rapidez y facilidad que se le otorga dicho crédito, es una persona muy amable y se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Karen lives in her family home in the 'zona Oriental' (eastern zone).  She has a 2 year-old son.  Raquel has a car that she provides to other people to use as a taxi.  She has been in this business for three years.  During this time, she managed to buy a plot of land and is building a room.  The loan that she was given was for finishing its construction.  Karen came to our institution through a recommendation from one of her friends who already has a loan and was pleased with the speed and the ease with which she received it.  Karen is a very kind person and she is grateful to our institution for the support she has been given.

loans.use: to buy building supplies
