This is her first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 15,000 meticals, which she will use to buy basic goods to resell. (flour, juice, soup, soft drinks, and more).  She is confident that she will make her payments on time so she can request more loans.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through two neighbors who are also clients of the institution.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (flour, juice, soup, soft drinks, and more)

loans.name: Tholukuphila Group

texts.en:
Nonhle is 27 years old and married with 1 child that is 6 years old.  She has been operating a retail shop for the last 4 months.  From her home, she sells cell phone minutes, electricity vouchers, and women's handbags.  She also receives a grant from the South African government to support her child.

Nonhle hopes to expand her business but says that her biggest challenge are customers who take her stock on credit and refuse to pay on time.  She thinks that the profits that she saves will help her send her child to college.  In the photo she is standing on the far left with the blue and black shirt.

She would like to thank WDB and Kiva for helping her life a lot.

loans.use: to buy cellphone minutes, electricity vouchers, and other things for resale

loans.name: Nyekplola Essenam

texts.fr: Essenam est âgée de 29 ans et est mariée à un technicien- electronicien.ils sont tous les deux parents de deux(02) enfants. Essenam est coiffeuse et tient un salon de coiffure  à la devanture de sa maison familiale à Adidogomé, elle associe à la coiffure  le commerce de vêtements pour femmes, elle à commencé cette activité en 2006 et aime son métier.
texts.en: Essenam is 29 years old and married to an electronics technician. Both are parents of two children. Essenam is a hair dresser and has a hair salon in front of her family home in Adidogomé. Along with her hair dressing business, she has included commerce in women's clothing. She started this business in 2006 and likes her work.

loans.use: to buy dresses and pants

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes for resale

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en:
Veronicah is 38 years old and hard working.  She is married and blessed with two children ages 17 and 10 years old. 

She has been selling second hand clothes for the last three years.  Previously, she was running a grocery shop.  She is grateful to Faulu Kenya for training her on business management.  She wants a loan for 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy shirts, dresses, and inner wears for children.

In the next five years, she hopes to run a wholesale business.

loans.use: To buy shirts, dresses, and inner wears for children

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah is 22 years old and hardworking business lady.  She has been operating a cafeteria to earn a living.  

Being a member of Faulu Kenya, she has been trained on business management.  This has helped her to improve her business hence raising her standard of living.  She wants in the next five years to expand her cafeteria into a restaurant and be able to generate sufficient income to spend and save.  She has requested for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy chicken for her restaurant.

loans.use: To buy chicken for restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To open a retail shop

loans.name: Thandiwe Group

texts.en:
Thandiwe is single with three children, aged between 32 and 39. She also has five grandchildren who live in her home. For the last year, she has been running a "spazza" shop (a little general store), selling sweets, drinks, chips, and snacks from her home. She also receives money from a South African government program to support her grandchildren. In the photo she is pictured raising her hand.

With the loan that she gets from WDB and Kiva, Thandiwe will add to the stock that she has in her shop. Over the next five years, she hopes to build a house or shelter to expand her store. She says the biggest challenge to her business is customers who take her stock on credit but do not repay on time.

She said that having this loan will eventually help pay for her grandchildren's education. She also added that she would like WDB and Kiva to also help her with something other than money like a "Bursary" for her child.

loans.use: to buy food and drinks to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Mokaya

texts.en:
Mokaya is a 30-year-old hard-working business lady. She has been operating a grocery shop for two years. Thanks to Faulu Kenya she has learnt how to keep business records and to manage her business.  She is married and a mother of two school-going children, ages 1 and 5. In the next five years, she wants to have built her own stalls for rental in the market place. 

 She wants a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to buy vegetables and tomatoes.

loans.use: To buy vegetables and tomatoes.

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah is 28 years old and a single mother of a four-year-old.  To earn a living, she runs a boutique.  She has been in the business for four years and has one employee.  She was previously was selling clothes to earn a living.  She works hard in her business so as to educate her child.  Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has managed to grow her business.

She hopes to own a company in the future.  She has requested 40,000 Kenyan shillings to buy clothes and handbags.

loans.use: To buy clothes and handbags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add to his stock of sugar, rice and cooking fat, and buy livestock to resell.

loans.name: Bethania Group

texts.en:
Asia, who is in her late 30s, is single with one child who attends school. For the past seven years, she has run a beauty salon. Asia works from eight in the morning until eight at night every day and is able to make a good monthly profit. She is a member of a loan group, called “Bethania,” which has 15 members who will hold each other accountable for repaying their loans.

Asia is requesting her fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loans to enlarge her salon building and provide for her household expenses. She has successfully repaid all of her previous loans. Asia will use this loan to buy modern salon equipment to attract new customers. Her dream is to one day open another salon in a different location.

loans.use: to buy modern salon equipment

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 31-year-old single mother of two. She earns a living by supplying sand and cement to construction companies and has been engaged in her business for seven years. Beatrice also earns extra income by running a taxi business. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her businesses.

Beatrice is requesting a loan of 70,000 KES to buy cement and sand. In the future, she hopes to get more cars for her taxi business and to open a driving school.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new clothing to sell

loans.name: Venza

texts.en:
Venza is a 40-year-old businessman who is married to Pauline. They work in the same business. The couple is blessed with three children ages six, 12 and 13. For the past year, Venza has worked as a tailor. He earns a monthly income of 8,000 KES which he uses to support his family.

Venza is applying for his first loan with KADET after being introduced to the organization by a KADET staff member. He will use his loan to buy material and cloth so he can increase the variety of clothes he makes and attract more clients. 

Venza will use the anticipated profit from his loan to educate his children. In the future, he hopes to open a large clothing store and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy material and cloth

loans.name: Roline

texts.en:
Roline is 28 years old and married with three children who attend school. For the past four years, she has been selling electrical goods and she has two employees. Roline has grown her business with the help of Faulu Kenya because she has been trained in business management skills.

Roline is requesting a loan of 50,000 KES to buy a refrigerator. In the future, she hopes to open other business outlets.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Jacqueline Javiera

texts.es: Jacqueline Javiera tiene 34 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 11 años, que tiene este negocio lo inicio por la necesidad de obtener un trabajo que le genere ingresos diariamente. Tiene un hijo a su cargo la lucha constante que realiza por mantener a su familia le ha permitido mejorar como persona. El motivo del crédito que realiza es para la compra de bolsos, camisas, sabanas, calzado, cosméticos, ropa interior entre otros.
texts.en:
Jacqueline Javiera is 34 years old. Her endeavor is the sale of general merchandise. It has been more than 11 years since she began this business due to her need to find work that would generate a daily income. 

She has a child under her care and she constantly fights to support her family. This has allowed her to better herself. 

The purpose for the loan she has taken out is to purchase bags, shirts, sheets, footwear, cosmetics and underwear among other things.

loans.use: to purchase bags, shirts, sheets, footwear, cosmetics and underwear among other things.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy, a 29-year-old married mother of two children, has been operating a green grocery for three years. She works hard in her business so as to help her husband with household expenses, and through Faulu Kenya has learned how to save her money and to manage her business. Mercy is now requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy vegetables and fruits.  She hopes to open other business outlets in the future.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more high grade manure and mulches.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 27 years old, married, and blessed with a two-year-old child.  Previously employed as a casual laborer, for six years he has been operating a bodaboda (motorbike) transport business to earn a living.  He also runs a retail shop to supplement his income. Peter has benefited from Faulu Kenya because he has learnt how to save his money, enabling him to buy a motorbike.  He is now requesting a loan of 90,000 Kenyan shillings to buy another motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es: Hilaria tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, hace más de 20 años, que tiene esta actividad. Ella es una persona muy responsable y disfruta de obtener un medio de vida para mantener a su familia. Ella solicita el financiamiento para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, granos básicos y enlatados. Sus objetivos son de comprar una gran variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: Hilary has a business that is a grocery store; she has been doing this for over 20 years. She is a very responsible person and enjoys earning a living to support her family. She is requesting funding for the purchase of candy, soda, bread, crackers, basic grains and canned goods. Her objectives are to buy a good variety of products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy candy, soda, bread, crackers, basic grains and canned goods

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 41 years old, married and has three children.  He has been operating a school for six years and has eight employees.  He joined Faulu Kenya so that he would get financial support. He has also benefited from the training offered by Faulu Kenya because he has learnt how to manage his business.

He hopes to grow the school and see the students excel.  He has requested 80,000 Kenyan shillings to buy computers.

loans.use: To buy computers.

loans.name: Carlota Del Carmen

texts.es: Carlota Del Carmen tiene 53 años, su actividad es la venta de refrescos. Tiene más de 26 años, que se dedica a este negocio. Su mayor desafío ha sido mantener su negocio activo, debido a que tiene competencia pero con el tiempo ha obtenido experiencia al tratar a sus clientes de la forma que ellos solicitan. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de pajillas, frutas, bolsas entre otras. Sueña con incrementar su negocio y mejorar cada día más.
texts.en:
Carlota Del Carmen is 53 years old. Her endeavor is the sale of beverages. She began this business more than 26 years ago. Her biggest challenge has been to keep her business active due to the fact that she has competition. However, with time she has obtained experience in treating her customers the way they want to be treated. 

The loan she has requested is for the purchase of drinking straws, fruit and bags among other things. Her dream is to expand her business and improve each day.

loans.use: to purchase of drinking straws, fruit and bags among other things.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El señor Miguel es casado, su esposa es profesora trabaja en un colegio de la ciudad, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad, miguel se dedica a la actividad de taxista por mas de 2 años,viene realizando esta labor, trabajando en el cercado de ica y también para los hoteles brindándole servicio a los turistas,los desafíos que enfrenta es estas en taxi todo el día y aveces hasta de madrugada para ganar un poco mas de dinero para el bienestar de su familia, el crédito que miguel esta solicitando es para mejoramiento de su vivienda ya que desea poner piso en la sala de sus casa ademas de tarrajear las paredes de la misma, miguel tiene muchos sueños unos de ellos es terminar de construir su casa, y adquirir otra movilidad para así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, miguel esta muy contento con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Señor Miguel is married. His wife is a teacher working at a school in the city. He has a 3-year-old child. Miguel has made his living in the taxi business for more than two years. He has been doing this job, working in the district of Ica and also working for hotels offering his services to tourists. 

The challenges he faces are that he is in the taxi all day and sometimes until the early morning hours in order to make a little money for the well-being of his family. The loan that Miguel is requesting is to improve his house because he wants to put a floor in his home’s living room in addition to plastering the living room’s walls.

Miguel has many dreams. One of them is to finish the construction on his house and acquire another vehicle to improve his family’s quality of life. Miguel is very happy about the confidence that you offer him.

loans.use: to improve his home by putting a floor in the living room and plastering the living room's walls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy butter, eggs, flour and food coloring.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase tools used in refrigerator repair and maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa Maria tiene 61 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de reparación de calzado. Tiene más de 10 años en su negocio, inicio este medio de vida por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar pues con mucho esfuerzo logro mantener a sus cuatro hijos que tenia a cargo. El crédito es para la compra de hilo, suelas, cuero, cuchillas, tijeras entre otros utensilios necesarios.
texts.en: Rosa María is 61 years old.  She provides shoe repair services.  She’s been in business for over 10 years.  She started this way of life because of the need to meet household expenses; with much effort she was able to support the four children she had in her care.  She will use the loan to buy thread, soles, leather, blades and scissors, among other necessary tools.

loans.use: to buy thread, soles, leather, blades and scissors.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est âgée de 41 ans et vit avec son enfant et son mari qui est cuisinier. Elle est revendeuse de pagnes depuis 2000 et parallèlement  commercialise aussi des  yaourts qu’elle fait elle-même. Elle vend à domicile et s’approvisionne aussi sur place. Ce crédit lui permettra de s’approvisionner en pagnes et en sacs de lait pour les besoins de son commerce. Elle espère voir agrandir son activité pour de meilleurs lendemains.
texts.en: Afi is 41 years old. She lives with her child and her husband, who works as a cook. She started selling pagnes (colorful West African cloth) in 2000. As a sideline, she also makes yogurt for sale. She conducts her sales from her home, and gets her supplies locally. This loan will allow her to stock up on pagnes and bags of milk to sustain her activities. She wants to expand her business to ensure a better future.

loans.use: to buy milk and pagnes

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 55 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Manuel de 67 años y sus 7 queridos hijos, por quienes él se esfuerza para darles una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de Juana esta ubicado en el mercado N° 2 (Mercado importante de la ciudad de Pucallpa), en donde vende verduras como zapallo, zanahoria, tomates, cebollas, entre otros productos alimenticios. Por tal su puesto es muy concurrido por sus clientes, motivo por el cual su mercadería se vende muy rápido. Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día parada atendiendo a sus clientes, y eso le perjudica los riñones. Para el futuro, espera tener una tienda muy grande donde pueda vender verduras y ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP y espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, en su banco comunal es muy querida por sus socias debido a la alegría que pone en el grupo. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más verduras, ya que desea implementar mejor su puesto de ventas.
texts.en:
Juana is 55 years old.  She’s an unassuming, hard working woman living in her own house with her 67-year-old husband, Manuel, and her seven beloved children that she strives to provide a better quality of life for.  

Juana’s stand is located in the Number 2 Market, an important market in the city of Pucallpa, where she sells vegetables like pumpkin, carrots, tomatoes and onions, among other foodstuffs.  Her stand is very well known and popular with her customers so her merchandise sells out quickly.  She’s been in business for two years and considers the most difficult part having to remain standing all day tending to customers which damages her kidneys.  In the future, she’d like to have a larger store where she can sell vegetables and offer more comfort to her customers.

This is her 8th loan with MFP.  She expects to be very punctual with her payments.  She is very well liked by the fellow members of her communal bank because of the joy she brings to the group.   She will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy more vegetables because she wants to better stock her sales stand.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to stock her stand.

loans.name: Santos Valentin

texts.es: Santos Valentín tiene 42 años, tiene su actividad que es brindar el servicio de barbería y vulcanizacion. Hace más de 16 años que administra este negocio, la experiencia obtenida en su trabajo le ha brindado el desempeño que sus clientes le solicitan. El negocio está ubicado en su vivienda, ya que no tiene mucha competencia en este negocio lo que le proporciona los ingresos necesarios. El financiamiento para la compra de espumas, peines, maquinas para resurar, talcos y cuchillas  entre otros.
texts.en: Santos Valentín, 42, is a barber.  He’s run his business for over 16 years.  The experience he’s gained at work has led to his customers seeking him out.  The business is home-based.  Because he does not have much competition in this business it generates sufficient income.  The loan is to buy rubber marking crayon, tires and tire removers, among others.

loans.use: to buy combs, hair products, scissors and talcum powder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Juan Ernesto

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 55 años de edad,es soltero y no tiene hijos, juan se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas, salchipollos y bebidas viene realizando esta labor por mas de 3 años, teniendo una gran acogida anteriormente juan trabajaba en algunos fundos cercanos de la ciudad, con el tiempo logro ahorrar dinero y así se compro su carrito sanguchero teniendo así su propio negocio, el dinero que esta solicitando es para comprar sillas y mesas y algunos utensilios para así atender mejor a sus clientes, juan tiene sueños uno de ellos es hacer crecer mas su negocio y así tener una mejor calidad de vida, juan es muy agradecido con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: 55 year year old Juan is single and doesn't have kids. Juan works selling hamburgers, salchipollos (a dish of potato, chicken and hotdog sausage), and drinks. He has been doing this for more than 3 years, and his business has been well received. Previously, Juan worked on some farms close to the city and, over time, he was able to save money and bought his food cart, and in this way he got his own business. He is requesting a loan to buy chairs and tables and some tools so that he can better serve his customers. Juan has dreams, and one of them is to keep growing his business and so to have a better quality of life. Juan is very grateful for the confidence shown in him by this loan.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and some tools for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar tiene 44 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de taxi. Hace más de 16 años que tiene este negocio, el sacrificio y la necesidad le ha brindado a su familia el pan de cada día todos los días.  Tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, a quienes le enseña  a trabajar honradamente y ganarse la vida de una manera más humilde. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de llantas, focos y repuestos para su taxi.
texts.en: Julio Cesar is 44 years old. His business is providing taxi services. He has operated this business for more than 16 years. Through his sacrifices, he has provided his family with their daily bread and fulfilled their needs each day. He has 3 minor children in his care, and he is teaching them to work honestly and earn a living in a humble manner. The loan he is requesting is to buy tires, lightbulbs and spare parts for his taxi.

loans.use: to buy tires, lightbulbs and spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off a debt.

loans.name: Lucinda

texts.es:
La señora Lucila, vive en Condega municipio de Estelí, tiene 46 años de edad, esta casada, es madre tres hijos. Ella se dedica a la agricultura y también es comerciante. Comenzó en esta actividad desde temprana edad ella logro estudiar para ser maestra y dar clases a niños de primaria que habitan en su comunidad combinaba esta actividad con las labores domesticas de su hogar. Con el paso del tiempo compro un molino para triturar maíz y ofrecer este servicio en su comunidad, su esposo le ayuda a ella a sembrar frijoles que es otra actividad que realiza.
Ella solicito el crédito para sembrar 1 manzana de frijol, 1.5 manzana de maíz, compra de insumos, fertilizantes, fungicida  para evitar las plagas y pagar mano de obra. Con esta inversión va a darle un buen mantenimiento a sus cultivos, mejorar el nivel de rendimiento de sus siembras, sacar ingresos que le permitan seguir trabajando para progresar. En sus próximos planes quiere criar gallinas para vender y seguir mejorando en su preparación como maestra para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia y su comunidad.
texts.en:
Lucila lives in Condega, in the municipality of Estelí. She 46 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She works in agriculture and also sells things. She began in this line of work at an early age. She managed to study to become a teacher and give classes to primary school-aged children in the community. She combines this work with her domestic work at home. Eventually she bought a mill to grind corn and she offers this service to the community. Her husband helps her to plant beans, which is another economic activity she engages in.

She requested a loan to plant one manzana [unit of land a little smaller than a hectare] of beans and 1.5 manzanas of corn, to buy inputs such as fertilizers and fungicides to prevent diseases, and to pay for labor. With this investment she will give good care to her crops, improve her production, and earn income that will allow her to continue working and making progress. For her future plans, she would like to raise chickens for sale. She would also like to continue improving in her education as a teacher so she can improve her family’s quality of life, and also that of her community.

loans.use: to plant one manzana of beans and 1.5 manzanas of corn, to buy inputs such as fertilizers and fungicides, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina tiene 35 años, tiene más de 8 años en su negocio. Su actividad es la venta de cosméticos, con el paso del tiempo ha logrado comprender lo que sus clientes le solicitan. Ella sale todos los días muy temprano desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche que regresa a su vivienda, Luz ha sido una mujer luchadora y triunfadora que ha logrado aprender a mejorar su actividad y brindar un medio de vida para los suyos. El crédito es para la compra de lápiz labial, cremas, tratamientos, perfumes y ropa interior.
texts.en: Luz Marina is 35 years old.  She’s been in business for over 8 years.  She sells cosmetics.  As time has gone by, she’s managed to understand what her customers request.  She goes out daily starting very early at 7am and continues until 8pm when she returns home.  Luz has been a tenacious, successful woman who has learned how to improve her business and provide a means of support for her loved ones.  She will use the loan to buy lipstick, cream, beauty treatments, perfume and underwear.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and underwear.

loans.name: Lis

texts.es: Lis tiene 31 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su esposo Raúl de 36 años y su querida hija Tiffany de 10 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de comida de Lis siempre esta lleno de gente que continuamente van a consumir algún platillo que prepara, y esto es gracias a la buena ubicación donde se encuentra su establecimiento.  Además los precios que ofrece a sus clientes son muy accesibles y este es el principal gancho de su puesto de comida. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar y ver como las personas alaban su buena sazón. Lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y lo más difícil para ella es atender a todos sus clientes y mantenerlos satisfechos, espera que en el futuro su puesto de comida crezca, sabe que para alcanzar sus metas tiene que trabajar muy duro y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP y al igual como hizo con sus primeros créditos, esta dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy querida y respetada por la responsabilidad que demuestra. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más sillas y mesas para mejorar la atención en su puesto de comida.
texts.en: Lis is 31 years old and a very straightforward and hard-working woman. She lives in her parents' home together with her husband Raúl, age 36, and her beloved daughter Tiffany, age 10. She would like to provide her family with a better quality of life. The food stand Lis operates is always full of people who come in a steady stream to enjoy the dishes she prepares. This happens thanks to the excellent location of her establishment, and also because the prices she offers her customers are very affordable, which is the main attraction of her food stand. What she likes most about her work is cooking and seeing how people enjoy the good flavor of her food. She has done this work for 4 years, and the hardest part for her is waiting on all of her customers and keeping them satisfied. She hopes that in the future her food stand will grow. She knows that in order to achieve her goals she needs to work very hard, and she is ready to do so. This is her fourth loan with MFP, and just as with her earlier loans, she is determined to make all of her payments on time. Among the members of her communal bank, she is very well-liked and respected because of the responsibility she demonstrates. With the 1500 Peruvian new soles she is requesting, she will buy more tables and chairs to improve the service at her food stand.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: La señora Elsa nacida en Chuquisaca es casada con el Sr.  Isaac  de 42 años tienen 4 hijos, ellos trabajan en Rancho Nuevo a 5 km de la carretera a Tiquipaya ellos se dedican a la agricultura, siembran mayormente verduras: acelga, perejil y rábano, todo tipo de hortalizas, en esta ocasión solicito el dinero para el preparado de la tierra ya que ella sembrara zanahoria, sus hijos ayudan en lo que es la siembra y la comercialización de sus productos, ya que  ellos lo comercializan directo al consumidor en el mercado de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, donde ya tienen muchos clientes, la Sra. Elsa tiene una familia muy unida, se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Elsa was born in Chuquisaca.  She’s married to Isaac, 42, and they have four children.  They work in Rancho Nuevo five kilometers from the Tiquipaya Highway.  They are farmers growing mostly vegetables: chard, parsley and radish and all kinds of leafy green vegetables.  On this occasion she asked for the money to prepare the soil to plant carrots.  Her children help her with the planting and with the sale of her products since they sell directly to consumers at the market in the city of Santa Cruz where they already have many customers.  Elsa has a very united family.  She is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to prepare the soil to plant carrots.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Claudia Mercedes

texts.es: Claudia Mercedes tiene 41 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, la responsabilidad que tiene es su hijo de 15 años que está a su cargo. Inicio este negocio para ofrecer productos que sus diferentes clientes le realizan, Claudia es una mujer  muy emprendedora a pesar de los diferentes problemas que enfrenta como es el tiempo ya que tiene que recorrer muchos lugares. El crédito es para la compra de ropa en general, sabanas, cosméticos, calzado, toallas entre otros.
texts.en: Claudia Mercedes is 41 years old.  She sells general merchandise.  She’s been in business more than 8 years.  She has a 15-year-old son in her care.  She started the business to sell products ordered from her various customers.  Claudia is a very enterprising woman despite the various problems she faces, like time, because she has to go to several places.  The loan is to buy clothing in general, sheets, cosmetics, footwear and towels, among others.

loans.use: to buy clothing in general, cosmetics, footwear and towels, among other things.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 33 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En el distrito de Yarinacocha de la ciudad de Pucallpa, Martha tiene una tienda, ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas, como cerveza, gaseosas, vinos, piscos, los cuales son rápidamente consumidos por sus vecinos, ya que ella tiene la fama de vender solo bebidas de buena calidad y no adulterados. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, de esta manera hace más amenas sus largas jornadas de trabajo, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que quedarse hasta altas horas de la noche atendiendo a algunos clientes que desean sus productos. Con el tiempo, desea hacer arreglar la infraestructura de su tienda, para poder brindarle a sus clientes una mejor atención. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, esta dispuesta a trabajar muy duro para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en el grupo. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más bebidas para implementar mejor su tienda, con lo cual podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad para elegir.
texts.en:
Martha is 33 years old. She is a straightforward and hardworking woman. She lives her own house along with her 4 beloved children, for whom she wishes to provide the best quality of life. She has a store in the district of Yarinacocha in the city of Pucallpa. She sells drinks, such as beer, soft drinks, wines, and pisco, which are rapidly consumed by her neighbors because she is well-known for selling only drinks that are of good quality and not adulterated. What she likes most about her work is talking with her customers. This makes her long work days more pleasant. She has been in this business for 8 years and she thinks the most difficult part of it is having to stay until late at night to tend to customers who want her products. 

Eventually, she would like to improve the infrastructure of her store so she can provide her customers with better service. This is her first loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She is willing to work hard to make her repayments on time. In her communal bank she is a very responsible member and is always knowledgeable about the decisions made in the group. With the PEN 500.00 that she has requested, she will buy more drinks for her store so she can offer her customers a greater variety to choose from.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of drinks.

loans.name: Carolina's Communal Bank Group

texts.en:
Carolina is the president of a communal bank that consists of seven people, five of whom are women. Carolina is 20 years old and lives in San Lorenzo in northwest Ecuador. She is unmarried and lives with her parents. Her business, pictured in the photo, is a small general store in which she sells necessities such as cooking oil, canned food, toothbrushes, and selected over-the-counter medicines to meet the needs of her customers. 

Carolina works alone and reports that her business is going well. She is seeking this loan, her first, to purchase more products for her store to provide more variety to her customers. She hopes that this loan will help her increase her business. She is a young entrepreneur who began this business on her own and is working to see it grow.

loans.use: to purchase a wider variety of merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Fermin Moises

texts.es: Fermín Antonio tiene 65 años, su actividad es la venta de productos varios. Hace más de 1 año que tiene de experiencia con este negocio. El negocio lo inicio prestándole un poco cantidad de dinero a su hija, fue así que poco a poco ha ido aumentando su capital. La ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda, en donde la mayoría de sus clientes saben que el carisma y la buena atención de Fermín es importante. El financiamiento es para la compra de queso, bananos, granos básicos entre otros.
texts.en: Fermín Moises is 65 years old.  He sells assorted merchandise.  He has more than a year’s experience in this business.  He started the business with a little money he borrowed from his daughter and he’s gradually accumulated capital.  His business is home-based and most of his customers know how important Fermin’s charisma and good customer service are.  The loan is to buy cheese, plantains and basic grains, among others.

loans.use: to buy cheese, plantains and basic grains, among others.

loans.name: Mirma

texts.es:
Mirna, de 37 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Henry de 34 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Mirna es la compra y venta de pescado, ambulatoriamente distribuye a sus caseros su producto, el cual compra a precios muy cómodos. Ella tiene muchos clientes, ya que vende el pescado más fresco y sabroso del mercado y es una vendedora muy alegre, que siempre saca a sus clientes una sonrisa. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que éste trabajo la dignifica además que le es rentable para poder cubrir la necesidades de su hogar. Este es el primer crédito  con MFP, se siente muy feliz por desarrollarse como negociante y espera pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo. 
Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más pescado, ya que últimamente esta teniendo más demanda.
texts.en:
Mirna, 37, is a very kind, hard working woman living in her own house with her husband, Henry, 34, and their three beloved children that she wants to provide a better quality of life for.  

Mirna is a fish merchant.  She is a street vendor selling her products, which she buys at affordable prices, to homeowners.  She has many customers because she sells the freshest and most delicious fish in the market and she’s a cheerful seller that always produces smiles in her customers.  She’s been in this line of work for 15 years and considers that the work dignifies her and that it’s profitable enough to cover household expenses.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She feels very happy to develop as a merchant and expects to pay all her installments on time.  She will use the requested 500 new soles to buy more fish since she’s had more demand lately.

loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Nerith

texts.es: Nerith, de 51 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jeremías de 53 años y sus 2 queridas hijas Adriana de 20 y Anaé de 18 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En el cementerio Jardín del Buen Descanso (Cementerio principal de la ciudad de Pucallpa), se encuentra Nerith, ella tiene un puesto donde vende flores, es así que en pequeñas cajitas acomoda sus rosas, claveles, violetas, entre otras flores bonitas y que tiene un costo muy accesible para sus clientes. Lleva ya 10 años en este negocio y le esta yendo muy bien, aunque todavía no se siente realizada como comerciante, por lo que espera del futuro poder tener  una tienda dedicada solo a la venta de flores, de esta manera podrá pagar los estudios de su queridas hijas. Es el primer crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que cumplir con sus cuotas y espera poder hacerlo, además que no desea traerle problemas a su banco comunal, donde ha sido bien recibida. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más flores para surtir mejor su negocio e incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Nerith, 51, is a very kind, hard working woman living in her own house with her husband, Jeremías, 53, and their two beloved daughters: Adriana, 20, and Anaé, 18, that she wants to provide a better quality of life for.

Nerith has a flower stand at the Jardín del Buen Descanso (the main cemetery in the city of Pucallpa).  She arranges her roses, carnations and violets, among other pretty flowers that are at affordable prices for her customers, in little boxes.  She’s been in business for 10 years and is doing very well although she still doesn’t feel fulfilled as a merchant because she hopes in future to have a store dedicated exclusively to the sale of flowers in order to be able to pay her beloved daughters’ schooling.

This is her first loan with MFP.  She is aware that she must pay her installments and expects to be able to do so because she does not want to cause any problems for her communal bank where she’s been so well received.  She will use the requested 500 new soles to buy more flowers to better stock her business and increase sales.

loans.use: to buy more flowers.

loans.name: La Union Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LA UNION”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Virginia; ella es conviviente y tiene 36 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de artefactos, ella vende radios, televisores y Dvd en forma independiente llevando a lugares como Chunvivilcas y Lamay, ella por medio de este negocio la socia S. adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artefactos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar radios, televisores y algunos repuestos para los artefactos.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de golosinas, negocio de venta de animales menores, negocio de venta de comida, negocio de llamadas de teléfono.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “La Union” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco. 

Virginia lives with her partner, is 36 years old, and has two children. She works in the business of selling electronics such as radios, televisions, and DVDs, taking them to places like Chunvivilcas and Lamay. This is how she provides for her children. She wants to expand her electronics sales business. She is requesting the loan to buy radios, televisions, and some replacement parts for electronics. 

The other members: have a small grocery store, sell sweets, sell small domestic animals, sell food, sell phone calls. 

Virginia is grateful to those who are part of her dream through this program and she promises to make her repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy radios, televisions, and some replacement parts for electronics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: La señora Maritza se dedica a una pulpería. Vive en el municipio de quezalguaque, hace más de seis años, sus hijos le ayudan en la atención con los clientes, tuvo que hacerse cargo de toda su familia, ahora con mucho esfuerzo logró sacar su negocio adelante y puede cubrir los gastos de alimentación y educación con este negocio. Ahora piensa en el futuro de sus hijos a los cuales enseñó muy bien el negocio para que en un futuro ellos puedan valerse por sí mismos. Ahora solicita el crédito para poder comprar granos básicos, pan, refrescos, galletas, jugos y fósforos.
texts.en: Maritza owns a grocery store.  She has lived in the town of Quezalguaque for more than six years.  Her children help her to serve her customers.  She had to look after her whole family.  With a lot of effort, she managed to get ahead in her business and she can cover her family's food and education expenses with this business.  She is now thinking of her children's future.  She taught them the business so that, in the future, they can fend for themselves.  She is requesting this loan so that she can buy basic grains, bread, soft drinks, cookies, juice and matches.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, bread, soft drinks, cookies, juice and matches

loans.name: Valerio

texts.es:
El señor Valerio, tiene 59 años de edad, de oficio agricultor se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y crianza de ganado, el es originario de Condega municipio de Estelí, esta casado, es padre de3 hijos. El empezó en esta actividad desde muy temprana edad lado su papa pues el le enseñaba a preparar la tierra para sembrar así fue  aprendiendo hasta lograr independizarse de su padre lleva 35 años trabajando por si solo, aunque su nivel académico es bajo solo logro cursar hasta tercer grado de primaria ya que la mayor parte de su tiempo la dedico a trabajar. Hoy en día además de dedicarse a la siembra el cría ganado para vender que es su otro medio de subsistencia. 
Solicito el préstamo para comprar insumos para siembra, comprar fungicidas para evitar las plagas, fertilizantes, abonos y pago de mano de obra para sembrar frijol.  Con esta inversión esperar sacar una producción con calidad, mejorar el rendimiento de su cultivo y generar mejores ingresos para seguir sembrando. Su meta próxima es darle un buen mantenimiento a su cosecha y mejorar las condiciones de crianza de su ganado.
texts.en:
Valerio is 59 years old.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans and also raises livestock.  He is from Condega, in Estelí.  Valerio is married and has three children.  He started out in this business at a very early age alongside his dad who taught him how to prepare the land for sowing.  He learned from his father and then started working independently from him.  He has been working for himself for 35 years now even though he has a low level of education (he only studied up to third grade because he spent most of his time working).  These days, in addition to sowing his crops, he also raises livestock to sell.  This is his other means of survival.

Valerio requested this loan to buy supplies for sowing his crops, fungicides to avoid pests, fertilizers and manure, and to pay laborers to sow his beans.  As a result of this investment, he hopes to obtain top-quality produce, improve his crop yield and make better income so that he can continue growing his crops.  His next goal is to provide good care for his harvest and improve the growing conditions of his livestock.

loans.use: to buy supplies for sowing his crops, fungicides to avoid pests, fertilizers and manure, and to pay laborers to sow his beans

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: El joven Luis es soltero y vive en casa de sus padres, luis se dedica a la actividad de compra y venta de chatarra ( reciclaje de desechos de metal), eligió este tipo de trabajo por que tiene familiares que se dedican a la misma actividad, viene realizando esta labor por mas de 4 años, la forma en la que transporta estos materiales es con un triciclo que es de su propiedad, los desafíos que enfrenta luis es que el triciclo que tiene es muy pequeño para transportar los materiales ,y el los enfrenta realizando el traslado 2 veces al día, llevando dicha mercadería a los almacenes para así venderlo diariamente, el dinero que esta solicitando luis es para construir su propio almacén el cual lo construirá en la casa  de sus padres, y así almacenar lo que recicla todo el día, y así venderlo semanalmente dándole mas tiempo para reciclar mas mercadería, luis esta muy agradecido con la ayuda que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: Young Luis is single and lives in his parent's house.  He has a business buying and selling scrap metal (scrap metal recycling.)  He chose this type of work because he has relatives who are also in this line of business.  He has been doing this work for more than 4 years.  He transports these materials with a bike that he owns that has an attached cart.  One obstacle that Luis faces is that the bike/cart he has is very small and cannot hold a lot of material, so he has to make two trips a day carrying this merchandise to the stores where he sells it.  Luis is requesting a loan so that he can add a storage facility onto his parent's house.  Here he will be able to store the recyclable materials that he collects every day so that he can sell these materials weekly, which will give him more time to recycle more materials.  Luis is very grateful for the assistance that is being provided to him.

loans.use: to add a storage unit to his parent's house where he can store the scrap metal that he collects each day

loans.name: Sadith

texts.es: Sadith tiene 29 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Wilfredo de 34 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad a la que se dedica Sadith es la venta de lácteos, ella compra su producto y la vende ambulatoriamente, visitando casa por casa a sus clientes, quienes sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos no dudan en comprarle, también deja a crédito a tiendas donde ya tiene contratos anticipados. Lo que más le gusta de su negocio es vender su mercadería, ya que siente que su trabajo esta dando frutos, lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que transportar los productos pues son muy frágiles. Con el tiempo espera tener una tienda donde pueda vender ella misma sus productos. Este será su primer crédito con MFP por lo que espera el apoyo de todos ustedes y sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas a tiempo. Con los seiscientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos, ya que últimamente esta teniendo más pedidos por parte de sus compradores.
texts.en: Sadith, 29, is an unassuming and hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her husband Wilfredo, 32, and their 4 beloved children.  They hope to provide their children with a better quality of life.  Sadith sells dairy products.  She buys her products and sells them door-to-door to her customers who, knowing the quality of her products, don't hesitate to buy them.  She also sells her products on credit to the stores where she already has advance contracts.  What she likes most about her business is selling her merchandise, since she feels that this work pays off.  She has been doing this type of work for 2 years, and what she considers most difficult is having to transport her products, which are very fragile.  In time, she hopes to have a store where she could sell her dairy products.  This will be her first loan with MFP, and she awaits your support and knows that she must make her payments on time.  With the 800 Peruvian soles she is requesting, she will buy more products, since recently she is getting more orders from her buyers.

loans.use: to buy more dairy products to meet the demands of her customers

loans.name: Jenny Agustina

texts.es:
Jenny de oficio docente de primaria, con mas de veinte seis años, laborando, hoy en dia da clases los dos turnos, lo que se ha dedicado a tiempo copleto a su trabajo. Ya que anteriormente estaba comerciando ropa para obtener otra entrada de ingreso.
Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien es docente, de sus tres hijos, el mayor trabaja y aporta  a los gastos, los otros dos estudian.
Doña Jenny, ha tenido como objetivo el mejoramiento de su casa, quien ha vanido mejorando a travez de financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado.
Con este nuevo prestamo sera para la compra de puertas y ventana el cual las tiene con laminas de zinc, y desea hacer verjas y comprar la puertas para mejor seguridad de su familia.
texts.en:
Jenny has worked as an elementary school teacher for more than 26 years.  She is now teaching two shifts of classes, and she devotes all of her time to her work.  She previously worked selling clothing to have another source of income.

Jenny relies on the support of her husband, who is a teacher.  Of her 3 children the oldest works and helps support the household, while the other 2 are in school. 

Jenny's goal is to improve her house, and she has been doing this through the financing that Afodenic has provided her.  With this new loan, she will purchase doors and a window to replace the one she has that is made of corrugated metal; she wants to put in security bars and buy doors to improve her family's security.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a window with security bars on her house, providing better security for her family

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda de 45 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 2 queridos hijos Juan de 24 y Flor de 17 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Aunque era muy joven, Yolanda no dejó que las necesidades de dinero que tenía la venzan, es así que logro juntar un poco de dinero y poner su propio negocio de venta de comida. Ahora tiene muchos clientes, ya que sus deliciosos tamales y Juanes que prepara  son muy solicitados y consumidos por sus comensales, quienes también aprovechan en tomar algo helado que les ayude a sobre llevar el intenso calor de la ciudad de Pucallpa. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es atender a sus clientes, ella se esmera mucho en complacerlos, lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer bajo el ardiente sol todos los días. Para un futro cercano, espera poder comprar una carrito de comida, donde pueda trasladar sus cosas con mayor facilidad. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para poder continuar con su trabajo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para preparar sus deliciosos platillos.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 45 years old.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her two beloved children, 24 year-old Juan and 17 year-old Flor, who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.

Although she was very young, Yolanda didn't let her financial problems beat her.  She managed to put together a small amount of money and set up her own business selling meals.  Now she has a lot of customers and the delicious tamales and 'juanes' (a traditional chicken-based dish) that she prepares are very much in demand with her customers who also enjoy a little frozen something to help them beat the intense heat of the city of Pucallpa.

What Yolanda most enjoys about her work is serving her customers.  She takes great pains to keep them happy.  She has been in this business for three years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to remain under the burning sun every day.  In the near future, she hopes to be able to buy a food cart so she can move her things more easily.

This is Yolanda's first loan from MFP and she hopes to receive support from each and every one of you so that she can continue in her work.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more ingredients for preparing her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making her meals

loans.name: Claudio Manuel

texts.es: Claudio Daniel vive en reparto Mariana Sampson en donde ofrece el servicio de taller de soldadura y venta de repuesto de bicicletas, el lleva 4 años en este negocio. Al inicio tuvo ciertos problemas pues no ofrecía muchos servicios porque no tenía suficiente herramientas, pero con el paso del tiempo ha mejorado.  Claudio tiene 3 hijos bajo su cargo de 13, 5 y 5 años de edad respectivamente de quienes se encarga diariamente. El solicita un crédito para poder comprar llantas, asientos, cadenas, aceites, balineras, spray entre otros y así activar su negocio con la cual pueda mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Claudio Daniel lives in Mariana Sampson neighborhood where he has a welding shop and also a business selling bicycle spare parts.  He has been in this business for four years.  At first he experienced some problems because he didn't offer many services owing to a lack of tools.  However, over time his situation has improved.

Claudio has three children in his care who are 13, 5 and 5.  He looks after them on a daily basis.  Claudio is requesting this loan to buy tires, seats, chains, oil, ball bearings, sprays, etc. so that he can boost his business through which he is able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy tires, seats, chains, oil, batteries, sprays, etc.

loans.name: Lester Alfonso

texts.es:
El señor Lester Alfonso  es de la cuidad de Managua Nicaragua se caracteriza por ser una persona Responsable es padre de familia.
El señor visito nuestra oficina ceprodel  para solicitar Un préstamo para el mejoramiento de su vivienda para Invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción Como  zinc y perlin para mejorar el techo de su Vivienda.
El señor Léster le agradece a ceprodel por haberle otorgado el crédito para hacer las mejoras y hacer mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lester Alfonso is from the city of Managua, Nicaragua. He is a responsible person and the father of a family.

He visited the Ceprodel office to request a loan to improve his home. He will invest in construction materials such as metal sheets and beams to improve the roof of his house. 

Lester is grateful to Ceprodel for having granted him the loan to make these renovations and improve his home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Ana Sarai

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 21 años es madre soltera de una niña de 5 años, ella se dedica a la agricultura, compra todos los materiales y en ocasiones trabaja en el campo en compañía de su padrastro.
Actualmente iniciara la siembra de postrera, para lo cual solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en abono, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra, con este préstamo podrá realizar una nueva siembra y obtener la cosecha que le sirve para consumo y para comercializar.
Su objetivo es tener los medios para realizar la siembra y llevarla a cabo, pues de esta actividad depende ella y su hija, espera que con el préstamo logre salir bien y su cultivo sea abundante.
texts.en:
Ana is 21 years old and the single mother of a 5-year-old daughter. She works in agriculture. She buys all of the supplies, and sometimes she works in the fields together with her stepfather. 

Currently, she is starting the last crop of the season, and she is requesting a loan so she can invest in compost and fertilizer for it, as well as paying farm workers. With this loan, she will be able to grow an additional crop and obtain the harvested produce, which is useful to her for consumption and sale. 

Ana's objective is to have the means to plant and harvest this crop, because this activity is the means of support for herself and her daughter. She hopes that with this loan, things will turn out well and her crop will be abundant.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer to plant corn.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María es una joven que vive al lado de su madre y sus hermanos en los terrenos que le dejó su padre. Toda su vida ha estado ligada a las tareas del campo y aprendió muchas de las costumbre de su tierra natal. Su madre fue su primera maestra que forjó en ella los deseos de superación y a la vez humildad. De igual manera también le enseñó lo básico del arte en elaborar bordados en prendas típicas de su región, por lo que realiza  bellos trabajos que se están dando a conocer en su zona y poco a poco tiene mayor demanda de sus clientes. Para María éste es un trabajo muy bueno que le permite la flexibilidad en su tiempo y a la vez estudiar. Su deseo es mejorar en su producción e innovar nuevos diseños en los bordados. Es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, supo de la financiera por medio de una de sus vecinas y no dudo en acudir a solicitar este crédito que es una buena oportunidad para crecer. Con el dinero invertirá en la compra al por mayor de telas, hilos y aplicaciones y con otra parte comprará sacos de abono para sembrar maíz.
texts.en:
Maria is a young woman who lives with her mother and brothers and sisters on the land left to them by their father.  She has worked in the fields all of her life and learned many of the customs of her native land.  Her mother was the first teacher who instilled in her the desire to get ahead and at the same time to be humble.  She also taught her the basic art of embroidery on the typical clothing of her region.  She does beautiful work and is becoming known in this area and little by little she has more requests from customers.  For Maria this is very good work because it gives her flexibility with her time and also she can study.  Her wish is to increase production and to create new embroidery designs.  

This is her first loan with MFP.  She learned about the financing through some neighbors and realized that receiving a loan was a good opportunity to grow.  She will use the money to buy fabric, thread, and applications and also to buy sacks of fertilizer to plant corn.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread and applications such as beads and also to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay school fees.

loans.name: Heidy Saray

texts.es:
Heidy  es una mujer muy luchadora, y ha sacado a su familia adelante por sí sola. 
Por falta de dinero no ha podido mejorar su casita, en este momento solo le falta el piso, y es por eso que hoy ella necesita un préstamo de ₡400 000 (cuatrocientos mil colones) para la compra de cerámica  para el piso de su casa y también para la mano de obra.
Ella es socia de la empresa de Crédito Comunal de la Garita, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Heidy is a very tenacious woman; she has raised her family alone.  Because of the lack of money she’s been unable to improve her little house.  Currently, it’s still lacking flooring and this is why she needs a ₡400 000 (four-hundred thousand colones) loan to buy tile for her house’s floor and also to pay labor costs.  She is a member of the La Garita (Sentry Post) communal bank, one of EDESA’s 110 member firms in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to buy tile.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Tomasa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Tomasa, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 5 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado y elaboración de hamacas, tiene el negocio desde hace 2 años y medio, estas ventas las realiza de forma ambulante tres veces por semana, el resto de días lo dedica a la elaboración de hamacas.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de pescado para revender, además de comprar materia prima para las hamacas como hilo de seda de diferentes colores, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar el invetario y a disponer de más productos para ofrecer a los clientes.
Ella quiere ayudar a su hijo, para que estudie, además con el negocio quiere lograr un local fijo donde atender la clientela.
texts.en:
Tomasa lives with her husband and 5-year-old son.  She sells fish and manufactures hammocks.  She’s had the business for two and a half years.  She is a street vendor three days a week and spends the rest of the days of the week making the hammocks.

She is asking for the loan to buy fish to resell and to buy raw materials to make the hammocks like silk thread in assorted colors.  This loan will help her improve inventory and to have more products to offer customers.

She wants to help her son so that he can go to school.  Besides, she’d like to get a fixed locale for her business where she can tend to her customers.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell and silk thread to make hammocks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy eucalyptus tree trunks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRES MARIAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 38 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,fideos,galletas y golosinas, ella atiende desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y también la socia se dedica al negocio de crianza de cuyes, ella vende en forma independiente, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de crianza de cuyes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de fruta, negocio de venta de artesanías, negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de leña, negocio de tienda de abarrotes.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Tres Marías” (Three Marys) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

The member is 38 years old and has four children.  She is a grocer selling basic need items like rice, sugar, noodles, cookies and snacks.  She is open from 6am until 10pm.  She also raises guinea pigs that she sells independently.  She is able to raise her children through these businesses.  She wants to expand the grocery store and the guinea pig business.  She is asking for the loan to buy guinea pigs and basic need items like rice, sugar and milk.

The other group members sell fruit, crafts, vegetables, firewood and groceries.  The member is grateful to all those who share her dream and commits to make her installment payments according to the established payment plan.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and basic need items like rice, sugar and milk.

loans.name: Karla Jasmina

texts.es: Karla Jasmina , de 37 años de edad, originaria del municipio de Jalapa. Actualmente vive en la ciudad  de Condega municipio de Esteli donde se casó y procreo un hijo el cual tiene ocho años de edad. Ella tiene un negocio de mueblería el cual lo heredó de su familia en 1993, por tal razón no pudo iniciar sus estudios universitario llegando hasta el Quinto año de Secundaria, porque no podia descuidar los intereses familiares. Ella solicitó su crédito KIVA para impulsar un poco más lo que es la comercializacion de sus productos, los cuales se distribuyen solamente en el municipio de Condega, asi como también compra de madera seca y maquinarias las cuales las tenia un poco deterioradas. En la actualidad el negocio lo atiende con su esposo, pero aparte de eso ella aporta a los ingresos del hogar con un pequeño salón de belleza. Tiene como meta dar a conocer sus productos en los demás municipios y asi mejorar su calidad de vida y darle un futuro mejor a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Karla Jasmina, 37, is from the town of Jalapa.  She currently lives in the city of Condega, Estelí, where she married and had a son who is now 8 years old.  She has a furniture making business that she inherited from her family in 1993.  Because of this she was unable to start her university studies having only completed 11th grade because she had to see to her family’s interests.

She requested a Kiva loan to further her sales a bit more, which take place only in the town of Condega, and to buy more dry lumber and machinery since what she has is a bit worn out.  

She currently runs the business together with her husband but she also contributes to household expenses with a small beauty salon.  Her goal is to have her products be known in other towns to improve her quality of life and provide a better future for her young son.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and machinery.

loans.name: Nelva

texts.es: Nelva nació en la ciudad de Pomocanchis del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 29 años de edad. Actualmente, Nelva vive en la ciudad de Cusco junto con sus dos hijos. Nelva se dedica a la venta de artesanía en el centro comercial “Inti Pakari”. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como por ejemplo chompas y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años  que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la “Inti Quilla” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Nelva was born in the city of Pomocanchis, Cusco Department (Perú).  She is 29 years old.  Nelva currently lives in the city of Cusco with her two children.  She sells crafts at the “Inti Pakari” shopping center.

On this occasion she needs the loan to buy more merchandise like sweaters, for example, and some other things.  She’s been in this business for several years now and does well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  She is a responsible, hard working person.  Because of these qualities her companions invited her to participate in Asociación Arariwa’s “Inti Quilla” communal bank.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise, like sweaters, for example, and some other things.

loans.name: Yoana

texts.es:
Yoana forma parte del banco comunal “Emprendedores Unidos Punto Com” perteneciente a la comuna de Estación Central, ciudad de Santiago. 
Ella se dedica a vender ropa interior, como pantys, calcetas, camisetas, calzoncillos largos, entre otros, ubicándose con un puesto en una persa los fines de semana y durante las mañanas de los días de la semana vende en una feria libre. Además durante las tardes se dedica a vender empanadas congeladas afuera de los supermercados. Yoana se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 4 años, su marido la apoya y acompaña los fines de semana. Sus clientes son variados, ya que también ofrece y vende sus productos a sus cercanos.
Su mercadería la compra en una distribuidora en la ciudad de Santiago.
Yoana comenta que durante la temporada de invierno le va muy bien en su negocio, es por esto que durante la temporada de verano continua vendiendo los mismos productos. 
Con el crédito comprará ropa para su negocio.
Sus metas son establecer su negocio en un local comercial ubicado en un persa libre. 
Sus sueños son cambiar su vehículo particular por uno más moderno y grande, ya que le sirve para trasladar su mercadería. 
Yoana vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 20 años y 7 meses de edad.
Yoana está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito otorgado por Fondo Esperanza, ya que es una oportunidad para invertir en su negocio, además con las capacitaciones realizadas en las reuniones ha aprendido a registrar sus gastos y organizar mejor su negocio.
Estación Central es una comuna emplazada en el área céntrica de Santiago (capital de Chile), que debe su nombre a la Estación Central de Ferrocarriles, que data del año 1887, declarada Monumento Nacional en 1983. En sus inicios esta estación, junto con la estación Mapocho, fueron la entrada a la capital en el tramo Valparaíso -  Santiago y también desde la zona sur del país.
texts.en:
Yoana is part of the “Emprendedores Unidos Punto Com” (Dot Com United Entrepreneurs) which belongs to the Estación Central commune in the city of Santiago.

She sells underwear like panties, stockings, t-shirts and long underwear, among others in a Persian-style bazaar on weekends and during mornings the rest of the week she sells at a street market.  Also, during the afternoon she sells frozen turnovers outside supermarkets.  Yoana has been in this line of work for four years.  Her husband supports her efforts and accompanies her on weekends.  Her customers are varied since she also sells her items to her neighbors.  She buys her merchandise from a distributor in the city of Santiago. Yoana comments that during winter she does very well in her business so she continues with it in summer selling the same products.  She will use the loan to buy clothes for her business.

Her goals are to establish a business in a commercial locale located in one of the Persian style bazaars.  Her dream is to exchange her car for a more modern and larger one since she uses it to transport her merchandise.

Yoana lives with her husband and two children who are 20 years and 7 months of age respectively.  Yoana is very happy and grateful for the loan Fondo Esperanza granted her because it’s an opportunity to invest in her business.  Also, she’s learned how to keep track of expenses and better organize her business through the training sessions that take place during the meetings.

Estación Central is a commune located in the central part of Santiago (capital of Chile) that owes its name to the Central Railroad Station dating back to 1887 and declared a National Monument in 1983.  At its beginning, this station in conjunction with the Mapocho Station was the entrance to the capital on the Valparaíso-Santiago routes as well as from the south of the country.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Assane

texts.fr:
L'emprunteur est un chimiste qui transforme de la matière première en produits chimiques qu'il revend à des commerçants.Il pratique cette activité depuis 1979 après avoir arrêté ses études au collège.Il s'est rendu en Tunisie ou il a pu amassé assez d'argent avant de revenir s'implanter dans sa localité. Il produit et vend du grésil, du diluant, de la poudre anti-rat, de la peinture.. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants dont les trois sont à l'école primaire. Il gère deux familles: celle de son épouse et de ses enfants qui sont dans la capitale et celle des ses frères et sœurs qui vivent dans une autre ville.Ainsi, il a de très lourdes charges comme l'alimentation,la santé, la scolarité des enfants et l'habillement.
Il a ouvert un compte à l'IMCEC depuis 2009 et a obtenu un premier prêt de 50 000. Il a réussi à gagner une grosse clientèle qui l'oblige à toujours augmenter sa production. C'est pour cela qu'il sollicite un nouveau crédit 100 000f pour acheter 1 fut de diluant, 15 kg de soude acoustique, 500g de teinte noir, 25 kg de patte de grésil.Son activité est très rentable avec des bénéfices journaliers qui tournent autour de 8 à 12500 par jour.
Les bénéfices tirés des investissements qu'il compte faire avec ce prêt, l'emprunteur pourra mieux prendre en charge les dépenses qu'il effectue pour lui même mais aussi et surtout pour ses deux familles.
Son rêve est de créer une grande entreprise de production et de distribution de produits chimiques  dont la demande ne cesse d'augmenter sur le marché.
texts.en:
This borrower is a chemist. He converts raw materials into chemicals which he then sells to traders. He started practicing this activity in 1979 after quitting his post-secondary studies. He traveled to Tunisia where he earned enough money to return to his neighborhood to settle down. He produces and sells cullet, thinner, rat repellent, and paint. He is married with four children, three of whom attend school. 

He looks after two families: his wife and children who live in the capital, and his siblings who live in another city. As a result, his responsibilities with respect to food, healthcare, the children’s education, and clothing are considerable. 

He opened an account with IMCEC in 2009, and obtained a first loan of 50,000F. He managed to grow a large customer base, which constantly requires him to increase production. This is why he is seeking a new loan of 100,000F, which he will use to buy one barrel of thinner, 15 kg of caustic soda, 500 g of black dye, and 25 kg of cullet paste. His business is very profitable, with daily revenues ranging from 8,000 to 12,500F.

With the profits he expects to earn from this loan, the borrower can better face the expenses incurred to support himself and especially his two families. 
His goal is to launch a large company to make and distribute chemical products for which market demand is steadily increasing.

loans.use: to buy one barrel of thinner, 15 kg of caustic soda, 500 g of black dye, and 256 kg of cullet paste

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén es un padre de familia, natural de Carampa, ubicada al sur de Huancayo tiene 37 años y vive al lado de su esposa y sus 3 hijos en su propiedad. Siempre ha vivido en su tierra natal y desde su niñez sus padres le enseñaron todo lo esencial sobre como trabajar en la agricultura así como en la crianza de animales. Sin embargo siempre supo de las dificultades que existen en las tareas del campo que por condiciones climáticas pueden afectar seriamente las ganancias de la cosecha, por ello  optó en asegurarse sus ingresos con su tienda pequeña en su misma casa, su establecimiento es una de las 2 que existen en su comunidad y cada día tiene ventas regulares que le permiten tener un capital estable y ganancias más frecuentes a comparación de la agricultura que tiene que esperar varios meses en ver sus frutos. Ante esto sus proyectos de continuar es la de mejorar e implementar su tienda. Es la primera vez que esta solicitando crédito con MFP, su esposa fue la titular del crédito en ocasiones anteriores de manera grupal y decidió seguir trabajando con los préstamos grupales porque considera que es una manera efectiva de crecer en su capital e invertir de manera oportuna para su negocio. Es que por esta razón que invertirá el dinero recibido en la compra de más mercadería para su tienda.
texts.en:
Rubén is a father from Carampa located south of Huancayo.  He’s 37 years old living alongside his wife and three children in his home.  He has always lived in his native land and since childhood his parents taught him all the essentials of farming as well as livestock raising.  However, he always knew the difficulties inherent in field work because of the weather conditions that can seriously affect profits from crops.  Because of this, he opted to insure income by setting up a small store in his house.  His store is one of two that exist in his community and every day he has regular sales that allow him to have stable income and more frequent profits compared to farming where he has to wait several months to enjoy the fruits of his labor.  In light of this, his projects to continue are to improve and equip the store.

This is the first time he’s requested a loan from MFP.  Group loans were occasionally taken out by his wife previously and he decided to stick with the group loans because he considers them to be an effective way to grow his capital and invest in his business in an opportune manner.  He will use the money he received to buy more merchandise for the store.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Mayra Azucena

texts.es: Mayra Azucena de 46 años. Ella se dedica a la venta ropa usada ambulante. Tiene 5 años de dedicarse a este negocio y es su principal fuente de ingresos. Ha logrado establecer buena clientela ya que ella siempre cuenta con variedad de prendas de vestir y sobre todo buenos precios, estas son las razones por las que muchas personas buscan sus productos y la prefieren. Trabaja duramente todo el día para lograr vender la mayoría de sus prendas y hasta el momento lo ha logrado. El crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes entre otros.
texts.en: Mayra Azucena, 46, is a street vendor of used clothes.  She’s been in this business for five years and it’s her main source of income.  He’s managed to establish a good base of regular customers because she always has good selection of clothing items and, above all, good prices.  These are the reasons why many people seek out her items and prefer her.  She works hard all day to sell most of her clothes and to date has accomplished this.  The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts and suits, among others.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts and suits, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy PVC tubing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy construction materials

loans.name: Senda De Amor Group

texts.es: Maria Concepcion tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijas y un hijo, reside en la Aldea San Nicolas, y es miembro y coordinadora del Banco Comunal Senda de Amor. Doña Maria inició vendiendo nacatamales y ropa de segunda mano, y desde hace unos años se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de rosquillas y quesadillas. Ella se levanta muy temprano por la mañana para iniciar su jornada laboral, dos de sus hijas le ayudan a mezclar todos los ingredientes mientras ella prepara el horno, y una vez que sale el producto horneado, una de sus hijas le ayuda a entregarlo. Por la venta de su producto obtiene una buena ganancia pero cuando llueve mucho le va mal porque la leña se moja y no le da buen punto al pan y este se pasa de tiempo. Ella aprendió a realizar su negocio porque observaba a otras personas hacerlo y tambien las ayudaba para agarrar practica.
